English Sentences: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ, the Son of God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa doomettaa.

English Sentences: As it is written in the prophets, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi xaafido maxaafan Xoossai, Be7a, ta kiittiyoogaa taani neeppe sinttau yeddana. I neeyyo ogiyaa kessana.

English Sentences: The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issoi bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Godaa ogiyaa giigissite. I hemettana loossuwaakka ayyo sitti oottite giis yaagees.

English Sentences: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xammaqiya Yohaannisi asaa xammaqiiddinne, Intte nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettite; Xoossai intte nagaraa atto gaana yaagidi qaalaa yootiiddi bazzon kiyi wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea, and they of Jerusalem, and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan, confessing their sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa biittan de7iya asai ubbainne Yerusalaame katamaa asai ubbai Yohaannisakko yees. Yiidi ba nagaraa paaxin, Yohaannisi he asaa Yorddaanoosa SHaafan xammaqees.

English Sentences: And John was clothed with camel's hair, and with a girdle of a skin about his loins; and he did eat locusts and wild honey;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi gaameelaa ikisiyan daddido afalaa maayidi, ba xeessan dafuwaa gixxees; qassi booliyaanne degeeraa eessaa mees.

English Sentences: And preached, saying, There cometh one mightier than I after me, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi qaalaa yootiiddi, Taappe guyyeera daro minniyaagee yees; harai atto, hokkada a caammaa dafuwaa birshshanaukka taayyo bessenna.

English Sentences: I indeed have baptized you with water: but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena haattan xammaqais; shin i inttena Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqana yaagees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in those days, that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was baptized of John in Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode Galiila biittan de7iya Naazireete katamaappe yin, Yohaannisi Yorddaanoosa SHaafan a xammaqiis.

English Sentences: And straightway coming up out of the water, he saw the heavens opened, and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haattaappe kiyosaara saloi dooyettishiininne Geeshsha Ayyaanai ba bolli haraphphedan wodhdhishin be7iis.

English Sentences: And there came a voice from heaven, saying, Thou art my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi saluwaappe, Taani siiqiyo ta Na7ai nena; tana nebai ufaissees yaagiya qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaarakka Geeshsha Ayyaanai bazzo a yeddiis.

English Sentences: And he was there in the wilderness forty days, tempted of Satan; and was with the wild beasts; and the angels ministered unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bazzon bana Seexaanai paaccishin, oitamu gallassa gattiis; do7aarakka de7iis; kiitanchchatikka yiidi, ayyo oottidosona.

English Sentences: Now after that John was put in prison, Jesus came into Galilee, preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi qashettiichchidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi, Galiila biitti biis;

English Sentences: And saying, The time is fulfilled, and the kingdom of God is at hand: repent ye, and believe the gospel.
Wolaitta Sentences: biidi, Wodee gakkiis; Xoossaa kawotettaikka matattiis. Intte nagaraappe simmidi, wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa ammanite yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee, he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Galiila Abbaa lanqqiyaara aadhdhiiddi, moliyaa oiqqiyaageeta, Simoonanne a ishaa Inddiraasa, bantta gitiyaa abban yeggiyaageeta be7iis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, Come ye after me, and I will make you to become fishers of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7idi eta, Tana kaallite; taani inttena asa oiqqiyoogaa tamaarissana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And straightway they forsook their nets, and followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti sohuwaarakka bantta gitiyaa yeggi bayidi, Yesuusa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And when he had gone a little farther thence, he saw James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, who also were in the ship mending their nets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi guuttaa sinttaukko biidi, Zabddiyoosa naata naa77u ishantta, Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa wolwolo giddon bantta gitiyaa giigissiyaageeta be7iis.

English Sentences: And straightway he called them: and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants, and went after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I be7osaarakka eta xeesin, bantta aawaa, Zabddiyoosa, a oosanchchatuura wolwolo giddon yeggi bayidi, Yesuusa kaallidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And they went into Capernaum; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue, and taught.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa gelidosona; Yesuusi Sambbata gallassi sohuwaara Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi, tamaarissuwaa doommi aggiis.

English Sentences: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for he taught them as one that had authority, and not as the scribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baayyo alaafetettai de7iyo asadan, asaa i tamaarissiyoogaappe attin, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetudan tamaarissenna gishshau, asai a timirttiyan garamettiis.

English Sentences: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit; and he cried out,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode iita ayyaanai de7iyo issi bitanee Aihuda woosa keettaa gelosaarakka ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Let us alone; what have we to do with thee, thou Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art, the Holy One of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naazireeta Yesuusaa, neeni nuuppe ai koyai Nuna xaissanau yaadii Neeni oonakko erais; neeni Xoossaa geeshshaa gidikkii! yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he iita ayyaanaa, Haizza; bitaniyaappe kiya yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And when the unclean spirit had torn him, and cried with a loud voice, he came out of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita ayyaanai bitaniyaa daferettinnee, wolqqappe waasissidi, appe kiyi aggiis.

English Sentences: And they were all amazed, insomuch that they questioned among themselves, saying, What thing is this? what new doctrine is this? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits, and they do obey him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai garamettidi, Hagee aibee Ha bitanee ba alaafetettan harai atto, iita ayyaanatakka azazees; etikka qassi ayyo azazettoosona; hagee aiba ooratta timirttee yaagidi, ba giddon issoi issuwaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusabai sohuwaara Galiila biittan de7iya heera ubbaa gakki aggiis.

English Sentences: And forthwith, when they were come out of the synagogue, they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew, with James and John.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettaappe kiyosaara, Yaaqoobaaranne Yohaannisaara Simoona soonne Inddiraasa soo bi aggiis.

English Sentences: But Simon's wife's mother lay sick of a fever, and anon they tell him of her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona bollotiyaa qoxonne misho harggada zin77idaaribaa i yaa gakkosaarakka ayyo odi aggidosona.

English Sentences: And he came and took her by the hand, and lifted her up; and immediately the fever left her, and she ministered unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ikko shiiqidi, i kushiyaa oiqqidi, o dentti essiis; qoxoinne mishoi o aggin, a etayyo oottaasu.

English Sentences: And at even, when the sun did set, they brought unto him all that were diseased, and them that were possessed with devils.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harggida asa ubbaanne xalaheti oiqqido asa ubbaa omarssi awai wullidoogaappe guyyiyan, akko ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And all the city was gathered together at the door.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kataman de7iya asai ubbai he kare shiiqiis.

English Sentences: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases, and cast out many devils; and suffered not the devils to speak, because they knew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi dumma dumma harggiyan oiqettida daro asaa pattidi, daro xalahetakka kessiis. Kiristtoosa i gidiyoogaa xalaheti erido gishshau, eta haasayissennan diggiis.

English Sentences: And in the morning, rising up a great while before day, he went out, and departed into a solitary place, and there prayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi maallado wonttimaattan denddidi, sooppe kiyidi, asi bainnasaa biis; biidi yan Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooninne aara de7iyaageeti a koyiiddi biidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had found him, they said unto him, All men seek for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a demmidi, Asai ubbai nena koyees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also: for therefore came I forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi qassi eta, Hegaa heeran de7iya hara katamata hinddite; taani hegankka qaalaa yootanau bessees; aissi giikko, taani yiidoogee hegaassa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee, and cast out devils.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Aihuda woosa keettatun qaalaa yootiiddinne xalaheta kessiiddi, Galiila biitta ubbaa yuuyiis.

English Sentences: And there came a leper to him, beseeching him, and kneeling down to him, and saying unto him, If thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inchchirichchai oiqqido issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi, a sinttan gulbbatidi, Neeni koyikko, tana pattanau danddayaasa yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus, moved with compassion, put forth his hand, and touched him, and saith unto him, I will; be thou clean.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ayyo qarettiis; ba kushiyaa yeddidi, a bochchidi, Taani koyais; paxa! yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as soon as he had spoken, immediately the leprosy departed from him, and he was cleansed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaarakka inchchirichchai bitaniyaa yeddi aggin, bitanee paxi aggiis.

English Sentences: And he straitly charged him, and forthwith sent him away;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi wolqqappe godatidi, sohuwaara a kessi yeddiis.

English Sentences: And saith unto him, See thou say nothing to any man: but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, Nena era! Hagaa ooyyoonne yootoppa; shin baada ne bollaa qeesiyaa bessa; qassi neeni ha77i geeshsha gididoogaa asaa erissanau, Muusee azazido yarshshuwaa yarshsha yaagiis.

English Sentences: But he went out, and began to publish it much, and to blaze abroad the matter, insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city, but was without in desert places: and they came to him from every quarter.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin bitanee biidi, yohuwaa ubbasan asa ubbau oduwaanne laalettaa doommiis; hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi qoncciyaa kiyidi, katama gelanau danddayibeenna; shin asi bainnasan gaxan de7iis; qassi asai ubbasaappe akko yees.

English Sentences: And again he entered into Capernaum after some days; and it was noised that he was in the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amarida gallassaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Qifirinaahooma guyye simmidi, son de7ees giyo odoi siyettiis.

English Sentences: And straightway many were gathered together, insomuch that there was no room to receive them, no, not so much as about the door: and he preached the word unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettai ekkennan ixxin, harai atto, kareekka un77ana gakkanaassi daro asai shiiqiis; shiiqin Yesuusi qaalaa asau yootees.

English Sentences: And they come unto him, bringing one sick of the palsy, which was borne of four.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddu asati bollai silido issi bitaniyaa tookkidi, akko ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai darido gishshau, bitaniyaa Yesuusakko efaanau etayyo danddayettennan ixxin, Yesuusi de7iyo ginaara keettaa qaaridi, kaaraa lukkidosona; he lukkidosaara bitaniyaa i zin77ido halaara duge yeddidi, Yesuusa sinttan wottidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus saw their faith, he said unto the sick of the palsy, Son, thy sins be forgiven thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta ammanuwaa be7idi, he bollai silido bitaniyaa, Ta na7au, ne nagarai atto geetettiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there, and reasoning in their hearts,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe he sohuwan uttida issooti issooti bantta wozanan,

English Sentences: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
Wolaitta Sentences: Laa ha bitanee hagaa mala iitabaa Xoossaa bolli aissi haasayii Xoossaa xalaalappe attin, harai ooni nagara atto gaanau danddayii yaagidi qoppidosona.

English Sentences: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves, he said unto them, Why reason ye these things in your hearts?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta wozanan hegaadan qoppidoogaa Yesuusi sohuwaara ba ayyaanan eridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; Intte intte wozanan aissi hegaadan qoppeetii

English Sentences: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and take up thy bed, and walk?
Wolaitta Sentences: Bollai silido bitaniyaa, Ne nagarai atto geetettiis giyoogee mateeyye Woi, Dendda eqqada ne halaa tookkada hemetta giyoogee matee

English Sentences: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins, (he saith to the sick of the palsy,)
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taayyo, Asa Na7aayyo, sa7aa bollan nagara atto gaanau alaafetettai de7iyoogaa taani inttena erissana yaagidi he bollai silido bitaniyaa,

English Sentences: I say unto thee, Arise, and take up thy bed, and go thy way into thine house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nena gais; dendda eqqa; yaatada ne halaa tookkada ne soo ba yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately he arose, took up the bed, and went forth before them all; insomuch that they were all amazed, and glorified God, saying, We never saw it on this fashion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee sohuwaara denddi eqqidi, ba halaa tookkidi, asai ubbai xeellishin biis; bin asai ubbai garamettidi, Nuuni hagaa malabaa mulekka be7i erokko yaagidi Xoossaa galatiis.

English Sentences: And he went forth again by the sea side; and all the multitude resorted unto him, and he taught them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa Galiila Abbaa dooni biis; asai ubbai akko yiidaagaa tamaarissiis.

English Sentences: And as he passed by, he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom, and said unto him, Follow me. And he arose and followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaara aadhdhiiddi, Ilppiyoosa na7aa Leewa, giyoogee giiraa giiriyoosan uttidaagaa demmidi, Tana kaalla yaagiis. Yaagin Leewi denddi eqqidi, a kaalliis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, as Jesus sat at meat in his house, many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples: for there were many, and they followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qumaa maanau Leewi son uttidaashin, giiraa ekkiya daro asainne nagaranchchati aaranne i erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe uttidosona. Aissi giikko, a kaalliyaageetu giddon hegeetu mala asati daridosona.

English Sentences: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners, they said unto his disciples, How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners?
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi Parisaaweti Yesuusi nagaranchchatuuranne giiraa ekkiyaageetuura qumaa miishin be7idi, I aissi nagaranchchatuuranne giiraa ekkiyaageetuura qumaa mii yaagidi, erissiyo ashkkarata oichchidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus heard it, he saith unto them, They that are whole have no need of the physician, but they that are sick: I came not to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eti giyoogaa siyidi, Hargganchchatuppe attin, payyatuyyo aakime koshshenna; taani nagaranchchata xeesanau yiidoogaappe attin, xillota xeesanau yabeikke yaagidi etayyo zaariis.

English Sentences: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast: and they come and say unto him, Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast, but thy disciples fast not?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xammaqiya Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkaratinne Parisaaweti xoomoosona; amarida asati Yesuusakko yiidi, Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkaratinne Parisaaweti erissiyo ashkkarati xoomoosona; shin neeni erissiyo ashkkarati aissi xoomokkonaa yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, Can the children of the bridechamber fast, while the bridegroom is with them? as long as they have the bridegroom with them, they cannot fast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; Bullachchaa yiida asati machchiyo ekkiyaagee banttanaara de7ishin, xoomanau danddayiyoonaa Machchiyo ekkiyaagee etaara de7ishin, xoomanau danddayokkona.

English Sentences: But the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then shall they fast in those days.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin machchiyo ekkiyaagaa eta matappe efaana wodee yaana; eti he wode xoomana.

English Sentences: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment: else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old, and the rent is made worse.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ceega maayo bolli ooratta woto wotti sikkiya asi baawa; wotti sikkikko, ooratta wotoi ceega maayuwaa peererettana; peerettaikka kaseegaappe darana.

English Sentences: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles: else the new wine doth burst the bottles, and the wine is spilled, and the bottles will be marred: but new wine must be put into new bottles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ho77o woine eessa ceega ogoron naaqqiya asi baawa; shin naaqqikko, he woiniyaa eessai ogoruwaa daakkana; baukka gukkana; ogoroikka moorettana; shin ho77o woine eessaa ooratta ogoron naaqqeettees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day; and his disciples began, as they went, to pluck the ears of corn.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi issi Sambbata gallassi tiya banggaa giddoora aadhdhishin, erissiyo ashkkarati aara biiddi, banggaa tiyaappe duutettaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And the Pharisees said unto him, Behold, why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful?
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti Yesuusa, Be7a; neeni erissiyo ashkkarati Sambbata gallassi higge gidennabaa aissi oottiyoonaa yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Have ye never read what David did, when he had need, and was an hungred, he, and they that were with him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Daawiti namisettidi, miyoobaa koyido wode, banaara de7iyaageetuura oottidobaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii

English Sentences: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest, and did eat the shewbread, which is not lawful to eat but for the priests, and gave also to them which were with him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abiyaataari qeese ubbatu halaqa gidido wode, Daawiti Xoossaa keettaa gelidi, qeesetu xalaalai maanaappe attin, ooninne maanau higge gidennaagaa Godaa sinttan wottido oittaa miidi, banaara de7iyaageetuyyookka immiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi eta, Sambbatai asau merettidoogaappe attin, asi Sambbatau merettibeenna.

English Sentences: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani, Asa Na7ai, harai atto, Sambbataukka Goda yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he entered again into the synagogue; and there was a man there which had a withered hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettaa naa77anttuwaa geliis; hegan kushee silido issi bitanee de7ees.

English Sentences: And they watched him, whether he would heal him on the sabbath day; that they might accuse him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi asai Yesuusa mootanau koyidi, kushee silido bitaniyaa Sambbatan i pattiyaakko be7anau mintti naagees.

English Sentences: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand, Stand forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he kushee silido bitaniyaa, Dendda eqqada sinttau haa ya yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days, or to do evil? to save life, or to kill? But they held their peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan asaa, Sambbatan lo77obaa oottiyoogee wogeeyye iitabaa oottiyoogee wogee Asa shemppo ashshiyoogee wogeeyye woriyoogee wogee yaagidi oichchiis. SHin asai co77u giis.

English Sentences: And when he had looked round about on them with anger, being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man, Stretch forth thine hand. And he stretched it out: and his hand was restored whole as the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hanqqettidi, eta yuushshi aatti xeellidi, eti yootin siyennaageeta gidiyo gishshau, etau keehi qarettiis; he bitaniyaa, Ne kushiyaa piddi ootta yaagiis; bitanee piddi oottin, a kushee paxi aggiis.

English Sentences: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti Aihuda woosa keettaappe kare kiyidi, Yesuusa waati woranaakko maqettanau, Heeroodisa baggatuura sohuwaara issisaa shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea: and a great multitude from Galilee followed him, and from Judaea,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Galiila Abbaa biis; Galiilappenne Yihudaappe yiida daro asai a kaalliis.

English Sentences: And from Jerusalem, and from Idumaea, and from beyond Jordan; and they about Tyre and Sidon, a great multitude, when they had heard what great things he did, came unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka daro asai Yerusalaameppe, Eedomiyaasappe, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta baggappe, Xiiroosa katamaappenne Sidoona katamaappe Yesuusi oottidobaa siyidi, Yesuusakko yiis.

English Sentences: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asai bana un77enna mala, ba erissiyo ashkkarati wolwoluwaa baayyo takkissana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: For he had healed many; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him, as many as had plagues.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asaa i pattido gishshau, harggiya asai ubbai a bochchanau sugerettees.

English Sentences: And unclean spirits, when they saw him, fell down before him, and cried, saying, Thou art the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita ayyaanai de7iyo asatikka a be7ido wode ubban a sinttan gufannidi, bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikkii! yaagoosona.

English Sentences: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he iita ayyaanati babaa asau yootidi, bana qoncciyaa kessenna mala, eta minttidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And he goeth up into a mountain, and calleth unto him whom he would: and they came unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi deriyaa bolli kiyidi, ba koyido asata baakko xeesiis; xeesidoogeeti akko biidosona.

English Sentences: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti banaara de7ana malanne qaalaa yootanau eta kiittana mala,

English Sentences: And to have power to heal sicknesses, and to cast out devils:
Wolaitta Sentences: xalaheta kessanaukka etayyo maatai de7ana mala, tammanne naa77u asata dooriis.

English Sentences: And Simon he surnamed Peter;
Wolaitta Sentences: I doorido tammanne naa77ati hageeta PHeexiroosa yaagidi sunttido Simoona,

English Sentences: And James the son of Zebedee, and John the brother of James; and he surnamed them Boanerges, which is, The sons of thunder:
Wolaitta Sentences: Bo7anerggeesa yaagidi sunttidoogeeta, Zabddiyoosa naata Yaaqoobanne Yaaqooba ishaa Yohaannisa. Bo7anerggeesa giyoogee Dadaa milatiya asata giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And Andrew, and Philip, and Bartholomew, and Matthew, and Thomas, and James the son of Alphaeus, and Thaddaeus, and Simon the Canaanite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Inddiraasanne Piliphphoosa, Barttalamoosanne Maatiyoosa, Toomaasanne Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqooba, Taaddiyoosanne ba biittau mishettiya Simoona,

English Sentences: And Judas Iscariot, which also betrayed him: and they went into an house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aatti immida Yihudaa Asqqoroota.

English Sentences: And the multitude cometh together again, so that they could not so much as eat bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi soo biis; naa77anttuwaakka qassi daro asai shiiqin, inne erissiyo ashkkarati harai atto, qumaa maanaukka danddayibookkona;

English Sentences: And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: asai a, Gooyees giyo gishshau, a dabboti hegaa siyidi, a ekkanau biidosona.

English Sentences: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said, He hath Beelzebub, and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils.
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi asati Yerusalaameppe yiidi, A bolli Bi7eeli-Zeebuli de7ees yaagidosona; qassi harati, Xalahetu halaqai baayyo wolqqaa immin, xalaheta kessees yaagidi haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And he called them unto him, and said unto them in parables, How can Satan cast out Satan?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asaa baakko xeesidi, leemisuwaa yootiiddi, Seexaanai Seexaanaa waati kessanau danddayii

English Sentences: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi kawotettai ba giddon shaahettikko, he kawotettai eqqana danddayenna;

English Sentences: And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi issi keetta asaikka ba giddon shaahettikko, he keettaa asaikka eqqanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Seexaanai banaara ooyettidi shaahettikko, xayanaappe attin, de7ana danddayenna.

English Sentences: No man can enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin wolqqaama asa kasetidi qachchennan de7iiddi, a keettaa gelidi, a miishshaa bonqqanau danddayiya asi baawa; qachchidoogaappe guyyiyan, a keettaa bonqqana danddayees.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men, and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; Xoossai asa naatuyyo nagara ubbaanne eti cayiyo cashsha ubbaa atto gaana;

English Sentences: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation:
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bolli iitabaa haasayiya ooyyoonne merinau nagara gidanaappe attin, Xoossai mulekka atto geenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: Because they said, He hath an unclean spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa giidoogee, issi issi asati, A bolli iita ayyaanai de7ees yaagido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: There came then his brethren and his mother, and, standing without, sent unto him, calling him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aayyiyaanne a ishantti yiidi, karen eqqidi, akko asa kiittidi, a xeesissidosona.

English Sentences: And the multitude sat about him, and they said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai a matan uttiis; he kiittidoogee a, Be7a; ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti karen eqqidi, nenaara gaittanau koyoosona yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered them, saying, Who is my mother, or my brethren?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, Ta aayyiyaa oonee Qassi ta ishantti oonee yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he looked round about on them which sat about him, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba matan uttida asaa yuushshi aatti xeellidi, Be7ite; ta aayyiyaanne ta ishantti hageetihona.

English Sentences: For whosoever shall do the will of God, the same is my brother, and my sister, and mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai koyiyoobaa oottiyai ubbai ta isha, ta michchonne ta aayo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he began again to teach by the sea side: and there was gathered unto him a great multitude, so that he entered into a ship, and sat in the sea; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa Galiila Abbaa lanqqiyan tamaarissuwaa doommiis; keehi daro asai ba lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi shiiqettin, abban de7iya wolwolo giddo gelidi, aani uttiis; qassi he asai ubbai abbaa lanqqiyan de7ees.

English Sentences: And he taught them many things by parables, and said unto them in his doctrine,
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta darobaa leemisuwan tamaarissiis. Tamaarissiiddi hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Hearken; Behold, there went out a sower to sow:
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyite; issi bitanee zerettaa zeranau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as he sowed, some fell by the way side, and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up.
Wolaitta Sentences: I zerishin, issi issi zerettai ogiyaa doonan wodhdhiis; wodhdhidaagaa kafoi yiidi miis.

English Sentences: And some fell on stony ground, where it had not much earth; and immediately it sprang up, because it had no depth of earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai guutta biittai de7iyo shuchchaa anccuwaa bolli wodhdhiis; daro biittai bainna gishshau, he zerettai sohuwaara mokkiis.

English Sentences: But when the sun was up, it was scorched; and because it had no root, it withered away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai kiyido wode shulliis; adussa xaphuwaa yeddibeenna gishshau, meli bayiis.

English Sentences: And some fell among thorns, and the thorns grew up, and choked it, and it yielded no fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai aguntta giddon wodhdhiis; wodhdhidi mokkidaagaa agunttai diccidi cuullin, aifennan attiis.

English Sentences: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai aradda biittan wodhdhidi mokkiis; diccidi issoi hasttamaa, issoi usuppun tammaa aifin, issoi xeetaa aifiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi, Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai siyo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was alone, they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi yootidoogaa siyida hara asatinne tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi barkka de7ishin, akko shiiqidi, he leemisuwaa birshshettaa a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables:
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagiis; Inttessi Xoossaa kawotettaa xuura yohuwaa erai imettiis; shin harati kawotettaappe kareera de7iyaageeti, xeeluwaa

English Sentences: That seeing they may see, and not perceive; and hearing they may hear, and not understand; lest at any time they should be converted, and their sins should be forgiven them.
Wolaitta Sentences: xeellidi be7enna mala, qassi sissaa siyidikka akeekenna mala, eti naa77anttuwaa Xoossaakko simmin, i eta nagaraa atto geenna mala, etayyo ubbabai leemisuwan odettiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Know ye not this parable? and how then will ye know all parables?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Ha leemisuwaa erekketii Yaatin, leemiso ubbaa waati eruuteetii

English Sentences: The sower soweth the word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zeriyaagee Xoossaa qaalaa zerees.

English Sentences: And these are they by the way side, where the word is sown; but when they have heard, Satan cometh immediately, and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalai zerettiyo ogiyaa doonan de7iyaageeti hageeta; eti qaalaa siyiyo wode, Seexaanai sohuwaarakka yiidi, eta wozanan zerettida qaalaa efirggees.

English Sentences: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground; who, when they have heard the word, immediately receive it with gladness;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi shuchchaa anccoi de7iyo biittan zerettidaageeti hageeta; eti qaalaa siyidi, sohuwaara ufaissan ekkoosona.

English Sentences: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word's sake, immediately they are offended.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ha77issau de7iyoogaappe attin, etau mino xaphoi baawa; guyyeppe qaalaa gaasuwan waayee woi yedetai yiyo wode, eti sohuwaara xubetti aggoosona.

English Sentences: And these are they which are sown among thorns; such as hear the word,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi aguntta giddon zerettidaageeti hageeta; eti qaalaa siyiyaageeta.

English Sentences: And the cares of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, and the lusts of other things entering in, choke the word, and it becometh unfruitful.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha sa7aa de7uwau hirggiyoogee duretettaa siiqiyoogeenne harabaa amottiyoogee eta wozanan gelidi, qaalaa cuullees; cuullin aifennan atti aggees.

English Sentences: And these are they which are sown on good ground; such as hear the word, and receive it, and bring forth fruit, some thirtyfold, some sixty, and some an hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin aradda biittan zerettidaageeti qaalaa siyidi ekkiyaageeta; issoi hasttamaa, issoi usuppun tammaa aifin, issoi xeetaa aifiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel, or under a bed? and not to be set on a candlestick?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi gujjidi, Xomppe ehiidi, kereppe woi arssappe garssaara wottiya asi de7ii Xoqqan wottenneeyye

English Sentences: For there is nothing hid, which shall not be manifested; neither was any thing kept secret, but that it should come abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, qosidobai ubbai qoncciyaa kiyana; qassi genttidobai ubbaikka beettennan attenna.

English Sentences: If any man have ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai de7ikko siyo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Take heed what ye hear: with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you: and unto you that hear shall more be given.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka eta, Intte siyiyoogaa ezggidi siyite; Xoossai intte makkido qun77an intteyyo makkana.

English Sentences: For he that hath, to him shall be given: and he that hath not, from him shall be taken even that which he hath.
Wolaitta Sentences: I intteyyo darissidi immana; aissi giikko, issibai de7iyo urau gujji immana; bainnaagaappe harai atto, au de7iya he guuttiyookka ekkirggana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, So is the kingdom of God, as if a man should cast seed into the ground;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassikka yaagiis; Xoossaa kawotettai ba gaden katta zeriya asa mala.

English Sentences: And should sleep, and rise night and day, and the seed should spring and grow up, he knoweth not how.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee qammi xiskkees; maallado denddees; i ba huuphen waaniyaakkonne erennan, he zerettai mokkeesinne diccees.

English Sentences: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself; first the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittai kattaa barkka mokkeesinne aifees; koiro carshshai caarees; guyyeppe aifanau kukkumees; qassi wurssettan kumetta aifiyaa aifees.

English Sentences: But when the fruit is brought forth, immediately he putteth in the sickle, because the harvest is come.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kattai gakkiyo wode, kattaa shiishshiyo wodee gakkido gishshau, bitanee sohuwaarakka baacaara geli aggees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God? or with what comparison shall we compare it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Yesuusi, Nuuni Xoossaa kawotettaa ai milatees gaanee Woi aibiira leemisanee

English Sentences: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which, when it is sown in the earth, is less than all the seeds that be in the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa kawotettai sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifiyo milatees. He mittee aifiyo zeriyo wode, sa7an de7iya mitta aife ubbaappekka guuxxausu;

English Sentences: But when it is sown, it groweth up, and becometh greater than all herbs, and shooteth out great branches; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: o zerin mokkada ataakiltte ubbaappe gitatausu; daro daashshaa daayausu. Kafoi i tashiyaa kuwan bau keettaa keexxana danddayees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them, as they were able to hear it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hagaa mala daro leemisuwan asau gelana gakkanaassi, ba qaalaa yootiis.

English Sentences: But without a parable spake he not unto them: and when they were alone, he expounded all things to his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaayyo leemisoi bainnan yootenna; shin Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratu xalaalaara de7iyo wode, etayyo ubbabaa birshshidi yootees.

English Sentences: And the same day, when the even was come, he saith unto them, Let us pass over unto the other side.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi sa7ai omarin, Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, Abbaa hefintti pinnoos yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had sent away the multitude, they took him even as he was in the ship. And there were also with him other little ships.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati daro asaa yeggi bayidi, Yesuusi kase geli uttido wolwoluwan gelidi, Yesuusa banttanaara efiidosona; hara wolwolotikka hegan de7oosona.

English Sentences: And there arose a great storm of wind, and the waves beat into the ship, so that it was now full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqaama gotee denddin, beetai wolwoluwaa shocin, haattai kumana gakkanaassi wolwoluwaa giddo geliis.

English Sentences: And he was in the hinder part of the ship, asleep on a pillow: and they awake him, and say unto him, Master, carest thou not that we perish?
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yesuusi wolwoluwan guyye baggaara borkkotaa borkkotidi xiskkiis. Erissiyo ashkkarati a denttidi, Tamaarissiyaagoo, nuuni xayiyo wode coo xeellai yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he arose, and rebuked the wind, and said unto the sea, Peace, be still. And the wind ceased, and there was a great calm.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin i beegottidi gotiyaa, Co77u ga giidi, abbaakka, Woppu ga giis; goteekka co77u gin, ubbabaikka woppu giis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, Aissi hagaadan yayyeetii Intte waani ammanekketii yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they feared exceedingly, and said one to another, What manner of man is this, that even the wind and the sea obey him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti daro yayyidi bantta giddon, Hagee laa harai atto, goteenne abbai azazettiyoogee oonee yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they came over unto the other side of the sea, into the country of the Gadarenes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti abbaappe hefintti pinnidi, Gerggesenoona giyo biitti gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And when he was come out of the ship, immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa moogiyo gonggoluwaappe iita ayyaanai de7iyo issi bitanee kiyidi, Yesuusi wolwoluwaappe kiyido wode, Yesuusaara gaittiis;

English Sentences: Who had his dwelling among the tombs; and no man could bind him, no, not with chains:
Wolaitta Sentences: bitanee he gonggoluwan aqidi pe7idi, yan de7ees; a ooninne naa77anttuwaa harai atto, sanssalatan qachchanaukka danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains, and the chains had been plucked asunder by him, and the fetters broken in pieces: neither could any man tame him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i darotoo huqqunnaaninne sanssalatan qashettidi de7ees; shin sanssalataa duuterettees; huqqunnaakka mentterettees; a xoonanau danddayidai ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: And always, night and day, he was in the mountains, and in the tombs, crying, and cutting himself with stones.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ubba wode gallassinne qammi, he gonggoluwaa giddooninne dere bolli waassees; ba bollaakka shuchchan gaarees.

English Sentences: But when he saw Jesus afar off, he ran and worshipped him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa haahuwan be7ido wode, woxxidi ayyo goinniis.

English Sentences: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa Na7au Yesuusaa, nenanne tana aibee gattiyai Tana qaxxayenna mala, taani nena Xoossaa sunttan woossais yaagiis.

English Sentences: For he said unto him, Come out of the man, thou unclean spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa aissi giidee giikko, Yesuusi a, Laa ha iita ayyaanau, ha bitaniyaappe kiya yaagidoogaassa.

English Sentences: And he asked him, What is thy name? And he answered, saying, My name is Legion: for we are many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, Ne sunttai oonee yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin i, Nuuni daro gidiyo gishshau, ta sunttai Leegiyoona yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi iita ayyaanata he biittaappe kessi yeddenna mala, Yesuusa minttidi woossiis.

English Sentences: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding.
Wolaitta Sentences: He deriyaa bollan daro gudunttaa wudee heemettees;

English Sentences: And all the devils besought him, saying, Send us into the swine, that we may enter into them.
Wolaitta Sentences: iita ayyaanati Yesuusa, Nuna hini gudunttaa wudiyaakko yeddarkkii; etan biidi geloos yaagidi woossin,

English Sentences: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave. And the unclean spirits went out, and entered into the swine: and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea, (they were about two thousand;) and were choked in the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, Biite yaagiis. Yaagin iita ayyaanati bitaniyaappe kiyidi, gudunttatun gelidosona; naa77u sha7aa gidiya gudunttaa wudee kakaa huuphiyaara jaamiiddi, abban gelidi, meetetti bayiis.

English Sentences: And they that fed the swine fled, and told it in the city, and in the country. And they went out to see what it was that was done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gudunttaa wudiyaa heemmiyaageeti baqatidi, hanidabaa katamaaninne katamaappe gaxa biittan yootidosona; yootin hegaa be7anau asai yiis.

English Sentences: And they come to Jesus, and see him that was possessed with the devil, and had the legion, sitting, and clothed, and in his right mind: and they were afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusakko yiidi, xalaheti beni oiqqido Leegiyoona giyo bitanee ba wozanai simmin, maayuwaa maayidi, hegan uttidaagaa be7idi, ubbai yayyiis.

English Sentences: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil, and also concerning the swine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa be7ida asati xalaheti oiqqido bitanee hanidobaanne qassi gudunttaa wudiyaabaa he asaassi yootidosona.

English Sentences: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asai bantta biittaappe Yesuusi baana mala, woosaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come into the ship, he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi wolwoluwan gelishin, xalaheti oiqqido bitanee Yesuusaara de7ana mala, Yesuusa woossiis.

English Sentences: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not, but saith unto him, Go home to thy friends, and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee, and hath had compassion on thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi ixxidi a, Ne soo simmada, Godai neessi waanida gitabaa oottidaakkonne qassi i neessi waanida kehakko ne so asau yoota yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he departed, and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him: and all men did marvel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee biidi, Tammu Katamaa giyoosan yuuyidi, Yesuusi baassi waanida gitabaa oottidaakko, yootuwaa doommiis; i yootidoogaa siyida asai ubbai garamettiis.

English Sentences: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side, much people gathered unto him: and he was nigh unto the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi simmidi, wolwoluwan gelidi, abbaa pinnidoogaappe guyyiyan, daro asai abbaa lanqqiyan a mati yuuyi aadhdhidi shiiqiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue, Jairus by name; and when he saw him, he fell at his feet,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7iroosa giyoogee, Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqatuppe issoi, Yesuusa be7ido wode akko yiidi, a tohuwan kunddiis;

English Sentences: And besought him greatly, saying, My little daughter lieth at the point of death: I pray thee, come and lay thy hands on her, that she may be healed; and she shall live.
Wolaitta Sentences: kunddidi, Ta na7iyaa harggada haiqqana hanausu; a paxada payya de7ana mala, yaada ne kushiyaa i bolli wottarkkii yaagidi Yesuusa minttidi woossiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus went with him; and much people followed him, and thronged him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Yaa7iroosaara biis; biishin keehi daro asai a kaalliiddi un77iis.

English Sentences: And a certain woman, which had an issue of blood twelve years,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne naa77u laittaasappe doommidi, i bollaappe suuttai goggiyo issi maccaasiyaa de7ausu.

English Sentences: And had suffered many things of many physicians, and had spent all that she had, and was nothing bettered, but rather grew worse,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro aakimeti o aakimishinkka, a paxa kaa7ettaasu; ba miishshaa ubbaa wurssinkka iyyo haa iitidoogaappe attin, ainne o maaddibeenna.

English Sentences: When she had heard of Jesus, came in the press behind, and touched his garment.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maccaasiyaa Yesuusabaa siyada, asaa giddoora Yesuusappe guyyeera yaada, a afalaa bochchaasu.

English Sentences: For she said, If I may touch but his clothes, I shall be whole.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko a, Taani harai atto, a afalaa bochchikko paxana yaagada qoppaasu.

English Sentences: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ippe goggiya suuttai sohuwaarakka aggi bayiis; a ba waayiyaappe paxidoogaa ba bollan era aggaasu.

English Sentences: And Jesus, immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him, turned him about in the press, and said, Who touched my clothes?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi baappe wolqqai kiyidoogaa ba huuphen eridi, sohuwaara daro asaa giddon guyye simmidi, Ta afalaa bochchidai oonee yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his disciples said unto him, Thou seest the multitude thronging thee, and sayest thou, Who touched me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati a, Asai nena sugiyoogaa be7aidda, Tana oonee bochchidai yaagai giidosona.

English Sentences: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa ooni oottidaakkonne be7anau yuushshi aattidi xeelliis;

English Sentences: But the woman fearing and trembling, knowing what was done in her, came and fell down before him, and told him all the truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin mishiriyaa baayyo hanidabaa erada, yashshaa kokkoraidda yaada Yesuusa sinttan gufannaasu; qassi tumu hanidabaa ubbaa ayyo yootaasu.

English Sentences: And he said unto her, Daughter, thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace, and be whole of thy plague.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin Yesuusi o, Ta na7ee, nena ne ammanoi pattiis; saruwan ba, ne waayiyaappenne paxa yaagiis.

English Sentences: While he yet spake, there came from the ruler of the synagogue's house certain which said, Thy daughter is dead: why troublest thou the Master any further?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi biron hegaa giishin, Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa sooppe kiitettida asati yiidi, Ne na7iyaa haiqqaichchaasu; simmi tamaarissiyaagaa aissi daafurssai yaagidosona.

English Sentences: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken, he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue, Be not afraid, only believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eti giyoogaa siyidi, Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa, Ammano xalaalaa ammanappe attin, yayyoppa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he suffered no man to follow him, save Peter, and James, and John the brother of James.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi PHeexiroosappe, Yaaqoobappenne Yaaqooba ishaa Yohaannisappe harai ooninne bana kaallenna mala diggiis.

English Sentences: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue, and seeth the tumult, and them that wept and wailed greatly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa soo gakkido wode, Yesuusi asai wozanaa bayidi yeekkiyoogaanne zilaaliyoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And when he was come in, he saith unto them, Why make ye this ado, and weep? the damsel is not dead, but sleepeth.,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gelidi asaa, Aissi wozanaa bayidi yeekkeetii Na7iyaa xiskkaasuppe attin, haiqqabeikku yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they laughed him to scorn. But when he had put them all out, he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel, and them that were with him, and entereth in where the damsel was lying.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asai a bolli miicciis; shin asa ubbaa kare kessidi, na7ee aawaanne aayyiyo he banaara de7iya erissiyo ashkkaratanne ekkidi, na7iyaa de7iyoosaa geliis.

English Sentences: And he took the damsel by the hand, and said unto her, Talitha cumi; which is, being interpreted, Damsel, I say unto thee, arise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi na7ee kushiyaa oiqqidi, Xaalitaa, quumii yaagiis; hegaa birshshettai, Guutta na7ee, taani nena dendda gais giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And straightway the damsel arose, and walked; for she was of the age of twelve years. And they were astonished with a great astonishment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7iyaa sohuwaarakka dendda eqqada hemetettaasu; a tammanne naa77u laitta na7a; hegee haniyoogan asai keehi daro garamettiis.

English Sentences: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it; and commanded that something should be given her to eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa eti ooyyoonne odenna mala, eta mintti azazidi, Iyyo miyoobaa immite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went out from thence, and came into his own country; and his disciples follow him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaappe kiyidi, ba biitti Naazireete katamaa biis; erissiyo ashkkaratikka a kaallidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And when the sabbath day was come, he began to teach in the synagogue: and many hearing him were astonished, saying, From whence hath this man these things? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him, that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands?
Wolaitta Sentences: Sambbata gallassi Aihuda woosa keettan tamaarissuwaa doommiis; i tamaarissiyoogaa siyida daro asai garamettidi, Hagee ha ubbabaa auppe demmidee Ha ayyo imettida aadhdhida eratettai aibee Xoossai oottiyo malaataa i waatidi oottii

English Sentences: Is not this the carpenter, the son of Mary, the brother of James, and Joses, and of Juda, and Simon? and are not his sisters here with us? And they were offended at him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee anaaxiyaa gidennee Mairaami na7aa, Yaaqooba ishaa, Yoosa ishaa, Yihudaa ishaa, Simoona ishaa gidenneeyye A michchentti nunaara hagan de7okkonaayye yaagidi, i giyoobaa ekkennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: But Jesus said unto them, A prophet is not without honour, but in his own country, and among his own kin, and in his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he asaassi, Hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittan, ba dabbotuuninne bantta so asan bonchchettennaagaappe attin, ubbasan bonchchettees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he could there do no mighty work, save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk, and healed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I he sohuwan ba kushiyaa amarida asatu bolli wottidi, eta pattidoogaappe attin, Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottanau ainne danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: And he marvelled because of their unbelief. And he went round about the villages, teaching.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ammanibeenna gishshau garamettiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi hegaa heeran de7iya qeeri katamatun yuuyi yuuyidi, asaa tamaarissees.

English Sentences: And he called unto him the twelve, and began to send them forth by two and two; and gave them power over unclean spirits;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi, naa77aa naa77aa kiittiis; qassi etayyo iita ayyaanata kessiyo wolqqaa immiis.

English Sentences: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey, save a staff only; no scrip, no bread, no money in their purse:
Wolaitta Sentences: Immidi eta, Oge xam77appe attin, quma, qarcciita, intte kiisen miishsha ainnekka oiqqoppite.

English Sentences: But be shod with sandals; and not put on two coats.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tohuwan caammaa wottite; shin naa77u qole maayoppite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, In what place soever ye enter into an house, there abide till ye depart from that place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka eta, Inttena asi awan mokkikkokka, katamaappe kiyana gakkanaashin, he keettan utti bayite.

English Sentences: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them. Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttena asi mokkennasaa woi intte yootiyoobaa siyennasaa awa gidikkokka, he biittan de7iya asaayyo hegee markka gidana mala, he sohuwaappe kiyidi, intte tohuwaappe buhiyaa shocite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they went out, and preached that men should repent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati biidi, asai ba nagaraappe simmanaadan, qaalaa yootidosona.

English Sentences: And they cast out many devils, and anointed with oil many that were sick, and healed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti asaappe daro xalaheta kessidi, harggiya asaa daruwaa zaitiyaa tiyidi pattidosona.

English Sentences: And king Herod heard of him; (for his name was spread abroad:) and he said, That John the Baptist was risen from the dead, and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusa sunttaa denttiyo gishshau, Kawoi Heeroodisi hegaa ubbaa siyiis; issi issi asai, Xammaqiya Yohaannisi haiquwaappe denddiis; Xoossai oottiyo wolqqaama malaataa i oottiyoogee hegaassa yaagiis.

English Sentences: Others said, That it is Elias. And others said, That it is a prophet, or as one of the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin harati a, Hagee Eelaasa gidennee yaagidosona. Harati qassi, Hagee beni wode hananabaa yootiyaageeta milatiya hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidennee yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But when Herod heard thereof, he said, It is John, whom I beheaded: he is risen from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Heeroodisi hegaa siyido wode, Hegee taani qooriyaa muucissido xammaqiya Yohaannisa gidennee He i haiquwaappe paxiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Heeroodisi ba ishaa Piliphphoosa machchiyo Heeroodiyaado ekki wottiis; Heeroodisi i gishshau, ba huuphen asa kiittidi, Yohaannisa oittidi, qashissi wottiis.

English Sentences: For John had said unto Herod, It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yohaannisi Heeroodisa, Neeni ne ishaa machchiyo ekkanau bessenna yaagi wottiis.

English Sentences: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him, and would have killed him; but she could not:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodiyaada Yohaannisau uluwan morkkiyaa oiqqada a worissanau koyaasu; shin danddayabeikku.

English Sentences: For Herod feared John, knowing that he was a just man and an holy, and observed him; and when he heard him, he did many things, and heard him gladly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi xillo asanne geeshsha asa gididoogaa Heeroodisi erido gishshau, ayyo yayyidi, loitti naagi wottiis; Yohaannisi giyoobaa siyidi, ba wozanan keehi metootiiddikka abaa ufaissan siyiis.

English Sentences: And when a convenient day was come, that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords, high captains, and chief estates of Galilee;
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi ba yelettido gallassi, deriyaa haariyaageetuyyo, shaalaqatuyyoonne Galiilan de7iya gita asaayyo imatuwaa giigissido wode, wurssettan Heeroodiyaada injje gallassaa demmaasu.

English Sentences: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in, and danced, and pleased Herod and them that sat with him, the king said unto the damsel, Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt, and I will give it thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodiyaadi na7iyaa imattaa imattiyoosaa gela durada, Heeroodisanne a imattata ufaissaasu; ufaissin kawoi na7iyo, Nena lo77idabaa aiba gidikkonne tana oichcha; taani neeyyo immana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he sware unto her, Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me, I will give it thee, unto the half of my kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi iyyo daro caaqqidi, Neeni oichchidobaa aiba gidikkokka, taani neeyyo immana; harai atto, ta kawotettaappe baggaa gidikkokka, taani neeyyo immana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she went forth, and said unto her mother, What shall I ask? And she said, The head of John the Baptist.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7iyaa kare kiyada ba aayyiyo, Ai imma goo yaagada oichchaasu. Oichchin, i aayyiyaa, Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huuphiyaa imma ga yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king, and asked, saying, I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7iyaa eesuwan kawuwaakko baada a, Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huuphiyaa soruwan wottada, neeni ha77i tau immanaagaa koyais yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi daro qarettiis; shin ba caaquwaa gishshaunne ba imattatu gishshau iyyo caaqqido caaquwaa maanau koyibeenna.

English Sentences: And immediately the king sent an executioner, and commanded his head to be brought: and he went and beheaded him in the prison,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, sohuwaara zabainnaa kiittidi, Yohaannisa huuphiyaa ehaana mala azaziis; zabainnai qasho keettaa biidi, Yohaannisa qooriyaa muuciis.

English Sentences: And brought his head in a charger, and gave it to the damsel: and the damsel gave it to her mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: He muucidoogaa soruwan wotti ehiidi, na7eeyyo immiis; na7iyaa qassi ba aayeeyyo immaasu.

English Sentences: And when his disciples heard of it, they came and took up his corpse, and laid it in a tomb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyido wode yiidi, a ahaa ekki efiidi moogidosona.

English Sentences: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus, and told him all things, both what they had done, and what they had taught.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti simmidi, Yesuusaara gaittidi, bantta oottidobaanne bantta tamaarissidobaa ubbaa Yesuusassi odidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place, and rest a while: for there were many coming and going, and they had no leisure so much as to eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biyaabainne yiyaabai darin, harai atto qumaa maanaukka eta gattennan ixxido gishshau, Yesuusi eta, Nurkka guuttaa shemppi ekkanau asi bainnasaa hinddite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusinne eti banttarkka wolwoluwan uttidi, asi bainnasaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And the people saw them departing, and many knew him, and ran afoot thither out of all cities, and outwent them, and came together unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biishin, daro asai eta be7idi eriis; eridi katama ubbaappe woxxidi, eti biyoosaa etappe kasetidi gakkiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus, when he came out, saw much people, and was moved with compassion toward them, because they were as sheep not having a shepherd: and he began to teach them many things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi wolwoluwaappe kiyidi, daro asaa be7iis; asai heemmiya asi bainna dorssaa mala gidido gishshau, qarettidi asaa darobaa tamaarissuwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And when the day was now far spent, his disciples came unto him, and said, This is a desert place, and now the time is far passed:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omariyo wode, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidi, Hagee sohoi asi bainna soho; ha77i sa7aikka qammiichchiis;

English Sentences: Send them away, that they may go into the country round about, and into the villages, and buy themselves bread: for they have nothing to eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: asai dere giddonne qeeri katamatu giddo biidi, bau miyoobaa shammana mala, asaa yedda yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said unto them, Give ye them to eat. And they say unto him, Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi eta, Asau miyoobaa intte immite yaagiis. Yaagin eti, Nuuni biidi, naa77u xeetu biran oittaa shammidi, asai maanau immanee yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: He saith unto them, How many loaves have ye? go and see. And when they knew, they say, Five, and two fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Intteyyo aappun oittai de7ii Biidi be7ite yaagiis. Eti be7idi, Ichchashu oittanne naa77u mole yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata asa ubbaa citan citan shaakki shaakkidi, maatan utissana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: And they sat down in ranks, by hundreds, and by fifties.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai xeetai xeetainne ishatamai ishatamai citan citan uttiis.

English Sentences: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes, he looked up to heaven, and blessed, and brake the loaves, and gave them to his disciples to set before them; and the two fishes divided he among them all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ichchashu oittaanne naa77u moliyaa oiqqidi, pude saluwaa xeellidi, Xoossaa galatiis; oittaa menttidi asau gishana mala, erissiyo ashkkaratussi immiis; qassi naa77u moliyaakka eta ubbau shaakkiis.

English Sentences: And they did all eat, and were filled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis.

English Sentences: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments, and of the fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kallin attida oittaa xarzzainne moliyaa xarzzai tammanne naa77u samppaa kumidaagaa erissiyo ashkkarati denttidosona.

English Sentences: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oittaa miida attumaasai ichchashu sha7a.

English Sentences: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship, and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida, while he sent away the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara Yesuusi he daro asaa moissiiddi, ba erissiyo ashkkarati wolwoluwan gelidi, abbaappe hefinttan de7iya Beetasaida giyo katamaa baappe sinttatidi baanaadan azaziis.

English Sentences: And when he had sent them away, he departed into a mountain to pray.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarata moissidoogaappe guyyiyan, Xoossaa woossanau deriyaa huuphiyaa kiyiis.

English Sentences: And when even was come, the ship was in the midst of the sea, and he alone on the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai qammiyo wode wolwoloi abbau gidduwan de7ishin, Yesuusi abbaappe gaxan barkka de7ees.

English Sentences: And he saw them toiling in rowing; for the wind was contrary unto them: and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them, walking upon the sea, and would have passed by them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Carkkoi erissiyo ashkkaratukko carkkiyo gishshau, erissiyo ashkkarata abbaa shaariyoogee waissiyoogaa Yesuusi be7idi, kuttoi waassana haniyo wode abbaa bolli hemettiiddi, etakko yiis; eta yeggidi aadhdhanau koyiis.

English Sentences: But when they saw him walking upon the sea, they supposed it had been a spirit, and cried out:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abbaa bolli i hemettishin, eti a be7idi, banttau moitille milatin waassidosona.

English Sentences: For they all saw him, and were troubled. And immediately he talked with them, and saith unto them, Be of good cheer: it is I; be not afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti ubbai a be7idi, yashshaa kokkoridosona; shin sohuwaara Yesuusi eta, Aikko baawa; tanattennee yayyoppite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went up unto them into the ship; and the wind ceased: and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure, and wondered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etaara issippe wolwoluwan gelin, carkkoi woppu giis; gin eti daro garamettidosona.

English Sentences: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves: for their heart was hardened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eta wozanai dammido gishshau, eti oittaabaa akeekibookkona.

English Sentences: And when they had passed over, they came into the land of Gennesaret, and drew to the shore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti abbaa pinnidi, Gennssereexa giyo biittaa gakkidosona; gakkidi wolwoluwaa gaxaa shiishshi qachchidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come out of the ship, straightway they knew him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wolwoluwaappe wodhdhiyoogan, asai sohuwaara Yesuusa erinne

English Sentences: And ran through that whole region round about, and began to carry about in beds those that were sick, where they heard he was.
Wolaitta Sentences: hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubban woxerettidi, hargganchchata halan tookkidi, Yesuusi de7ees gin siyidosaa ehuwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And whithersoever he entered, into villages, or cities, or country, they laid the sick in the streets, and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment: and as many as touched him were made whole.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi biido soho ubban qeeri kataman gidin, gita kataman gidin, dere giddon gidinkka, asai hargganchchata giyaa sohuwaa efees. Yesuusi ba afalaa macaraa gidikkonne hargganchchata boshissana mala, asai a woossiis; woossin bochchida ubbaikka paxiis.

English Sentences: Then came together unto him the Pharisees, and certain of the scribes, which came from Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaawetinne Yerusalaameppe yiidi, higgiyaa tamaarissiya amarida asati Yesuusakko shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled, that is to say, with unwashen, hands, they found fault.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqidi Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issooti issooti geeyenna kushiyan, hegaa giyoogee meecettennan qumaa miyaageeta be7idosona.

English Sentences: For the Pharisees, and all the Jews, except they wash their hands oft, eat not, holding the tradition of the elders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Parisaawetinne Aihuda asai ubbai bantta aawatu wogaa naagidi, bantta kushiyaa loitti meecettennan mookkona.

English Sentences: And when they come from the market, except they wash, they eat not. And many other things there be, which they have received to hold, as the washing of cups, and pots, brasen vessels, and of tables.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi giyaappe yiidikka meecettennan de7iiddi mookkona. Qassi eti bantta aawatuppe ekkido hara daro wogai de7ees; hegee siiniyaanne keriyaa nahaasiyaappe medhdhido miishshaanne arssaa meecciyo wogaa.

English Sentences: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaawetinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti Yesuusa, Ne erissiyo ashkkarati aissi aawatu wogaa kaallennan ixxidi, bantta kushiyaa meecettennan oittaa miyoonaa yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said unto them, Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites, as it is written, This people honoureth me with their lips, but their heart is far from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; Isiyaasi hananabaa yootido wode, inttebaa, lo77o milatiya iitatubaa xaafidoogaadankka, Xoossai, Hagee asai tana ba bolla doonan bonchchees. SHin eta wozanai taappe haahuwan de7ees; asai tau mela goinnees.

English Sentences: Howbeit in vain do they worship me, teaching for doctrines the commandments of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, asi oottido azazuwaa Xoossaa higgiyaa milatissidi tamaarissees giis giidi hananabaa tumaa yootiis.

English Sentences: For laying aside the commandment of God, ye hold the tradition of men, as the washing of pots and cups: and many other such like things ye do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa azazuwaa intte aggi bayidi, asa wogaa minttidi naageeta yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi, Intte intte wogaa naaganau Xoossaa azazuwaa yeggi bayeeta.

English Sentences: For Moses said, Honour thy father and thy mother; and, Whoso curseth father or mother, let him die the death:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko Muusee, Ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha. Qassi, Ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo cayiyaagee haiqqo yaagiis.

English Sentences: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin issi urau ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo maaddiyoobi de7ishin i, Hagee qurbbaane; hegaa giyoogee Xoossaabaa giyoogaa giikko,

English Sentences: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother;
Wolaitta Sentences: i ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo wodeppe maaddanaagaa ainne koyekketa.

English Sentences: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition, which ye have delivered: and many such like things do ye.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi intte haratuyyo immido intte wogan Xoossaa qaalaa karidi, hegaa mala darobaa ootteeta yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had called all the people unto him, he said unto them, Hearken unto me every one of you, and understand:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asaa qassikka baakko xeesidi, Ubbai taani giyoogaa siyitenne akeekite.

English Sentences: There is nothing from without a man, that entering into him can defile him: but the things which come out of him, those are they that defile the man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa wozanappe kiyiyaabai asa tunissiyoogaappe attin, kareppe asa wozanan gelidi, asa tunissiyaabi aibinne baawa;

English Sentences: If any man have ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: siyanau haittai de7iyo urai ooninne siyo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was entered into the house from the people, his disciples asked him concerning the parable.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asaa yeggi bayidi soo gelido wode, i erissiyo ashkkarati he leemisuwaabaa a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Are ye so without understanding also? Do ye not perceive, that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man, it cannot defile him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin i eta, Intteyyookka qassi gelibeennee Kareppe asa wozanan geliyaabai aibinne asa tunissanau danddayennaagaa akeekeetii

English Sentences: Because it entereth not into his heart, but into the belly, and goeth out into the draught, purging all meats?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, qumai asa ulo giddo gelidi, gaxi kiyiyoogaappe attin, asa wozana giddo gelenna yaagiis. Hegaadankka Yesuusi quma ubbai geeshsha gidiyoogaa erissiis.

English Sentences: And he said, That which cometh out of the man, that defileth the man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis; Asa tunissiyaabai asa wozana giddoppe kiyiyaabaa.

English Sentences: For from within, out of the heart of men, proceed evil thoughts, adulteries, fornications, murders,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, asa wozana giddoppe kiyiyaabai iita qofa; shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogaa, wuuqqiyoogaa, woriyoogaa, shaaramuxiyoogaa,

English Sentences: Thefts, covetousness, wickedness, deceit, lasciviousness, an evil eye, blasphemy, pride, foolishness:
Wolaitta Sentences: duretettaa amottiyoogaa, iitatettaa, geniyaa, amottiyoogaa, qanaatiyoogaa, cashshaa, ayyuwaa, azallatettaa.

English Sentences: All these evil things come from within, and defile the man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha iitabai ubbaikka asa wozana giddoppe kiyidi, asa tunissees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And from thence he arose, and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon, and entered into an house, and would have no man know it: but he could not be hid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaappe aggidi, Xiiroosanne Sidoona giyo katamatu matan de7iya biitti biidi, issi keettaa geliis; qassi i yaani de7iyoogaa ooninne eranaagaa koyibeenna; shin qosettidi gam77anau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: For a certain woman, whose young daughter had an unclean spirit, heard of him, and came and fell at his feet:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ba guutta na7ee bolli iita ayyaanai de7iyo issi maccaasiyaa Yesuusabaa siyada, sohuwaara akko yanne a tohuwan gufanna wodhdhaasu.

English Sentences: The woman was a Greek, a Syrophenician by nation; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter.
Wolaitta Sentences: He mishiriyaa Aihuda gidukku; a yelettidoikka Sirofinqqe giyo biittaana; a ba na7eeppe xalahiyaa kessana mala, Yesuusa woossaasu.

English Sentences: But Jesus said unto her, Let the children first be filled: for it is not meet to take the children's bread, and to cast it unto the dogs.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi, Naati kasetidi qumaa kallona; aissi giikko, naatu qumaa ekkidi, zairotuyyo oliyoogee lo77o gidenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she answered and said unto him, Yes, Lord: yet the dogs under the table eat of the children's crumbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyaa zaarada, Tumakka ta Godau, harai atto masoofiyaa lanqqiyan de7iya zairotikka naatuppe attida suuppaa moosona yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he said unto her, For this saying go thy way; the devil is gone out of thy daughter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassi o, Ha ne qaalaa gishshau, ne soo ba; xalahee ne na7eeppe kiyiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when she was come to her house, she found the devil gone out, and her daughter laid upon the bed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyaa ba soo biyo wode, i na7iyaa xalahee ippe kiyin, hiixan zin77idaaro demmaasu.

English Sentences: And again, departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon, he came unto the sea of Galilee, through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Xiiroosa biittaappe kiyidi, Sidoonaaranne Tammu Katamaa giyo biittaara kanttidi, Galiila Abbaakko biis.

English Sentences: And they bring unto him one that was deaf, and had an impediment in his speech; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai tullenne duude gidida bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidi, ba kushiyaa a bolli wottana mala, Yesuusa woossiis.

English Sentences: And he took him aside from the multitude, and put his fingers into his ears, and he spit, and touched his tongue;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi barkka he bitaniyaa daro asaappe gaxaa kessidi, ba biradhdhiyaa a haittan yeddiis; qassi cuchchaa cuchchidi, a inxxarssaa bochchiis.

English Sentences: And looking up to heaven, he sighed, and saith unto him, Ephphatha, that is, Be opened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bochchidi saluwaa pude xeellidi, tookki shemppidi, Efttah yaagiis; hegaa giyoogee dooyetta giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And straightway his ears were opened, and the string of his tongue was loosed, and he spake plain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitaniyaa haittai sohuwaara dooyetti aggiis; qassi a dooqettida inxxarssaikka birshshetti aggiis; bitanee ainne waayettennan haasayi bayiis.

English Sentences: And he charged them that they should tell no man: but the more he charged them, so much the more a great deal they published it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asa ubbaa, Hagaa ooyyoonne odoppite yaagidi odiis; shin i keehi mintti odin, asai qassi oduwaa yaa darissiis.

English Sentences: And were beyond measure astonished, saying, He hath done all things well: he maketh both the deaf to hear, and the dumb to speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa siyida asai ubbai daro garamettidi, Ubbabaakka i loitti oottees. Harai atto tulliyaakka sissees; qassi duudiyaakka haasayissees yaagiis.

English Sentences: In those days the multitude being very great, and having nothing to eat, Jesus called his disciples unto him, and saith unto them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Amarida wodiyaappe guyyiyan, daro asai qassi Yesuusakko shiiqiis; asaayyo miyoobi xayin, Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi yaagiis;

English Sentences: I have compassion on the multitude, because they have now been with me three days, and have nothing to eat:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha daro asai tanaara heezzu gallassi gakkanaassi gam77idi, miyoobaa ainne demmibeenna gishshau, taani asau qarettais.

English Sentences: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses, they will faint by the way: for divers of them came from far.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani asaa namisaara soo yeddikko, asai biiddi, ogiyan daafuridi kunddana; aissi giikko, issoi issoi haahosaappe yiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his disciples answered him, From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi Yesuusa, Ha bazzuwan ha asa ubbaa mizanau gidiya oitta demmanau danddayiyai oonee yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he asked them, How many loaves have ye? And they said, Seven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, Inttessi aappun oittai de7ii yaagidi oichchiis. Eti, Laappun oittai de7ees yaagidosona.
