English Sentences: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground: and he took the seven loaves, and gave thanks, and brake, and gave to his disciples to set before them; and they did set them before the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi daro asaa, Sa7an uttite yaagidi azaziis; qassi laappun oittaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatiis; galatidi he oittaa menttidi, asaayyo gishana mala, ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo immiis. Erissiyo ashkkarati he daro asaassi gishidosona.

English Sentences: And they had a few small fishes: and he blessed, and commanded to set them also before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyo qassikka amarida suuppa moleti de7oosona; Yesuusi hegeetuyyookka Xoossaa galatidi, asau gishana mala, erissiyo ashkkarata azaziis.

English Sentences: So they did eat, and were filled: and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis; asai miishin attida xarzzai laappun samppaa kumidaagaa erissiyo ashkkarati denttidosona.

English Sentences: And they that had eaten were about four thousand: and he sent them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qumaa miida asai oiddu sha7aa gidana; hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi asaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples, and came into the parts of Dalmanutha.
Wolaitta Sentences: I qassi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura sohuwaara wolwoluwan gelidi, Dalmmanuta giyo biitti biis.

English Sentences: And the Pharisees came forth, and began to question with him, seeking of him a sign from heaven, tempting him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti yiidi, Yesuusa paaccanau eqqidi, saluwaappe malaataa banttana bessana mala, Yesuusaara palamaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And he sighed deeply in his spirit, and saith, Why doth this generation seek after a sign? verily I say unto you, There shall no sign be given unto this generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi keehi tookki shemppidi, Ha wodiyaa asai aissi malaata koyii Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ha wodiyaa asau malaati ubbakka imettenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he left them, and entering into the ship again departed to the other side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta hegan yeggi bayidi, naa77anttuwaa wolwoluwan gelidi, abbaappe hefintti pinniis.

English Sentences: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread, neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati qumaa efaanaagaa dogidosona; etau wolwoluwaa giddon issi oittappe hari baawa.

English Sentences: And he charged them, saying, Take heed, beware of the leaven of the Pharisees, and of the leaven of Herod.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Inttena erite; Parisaawetu irshshuwaappenne Heeroodisa irshshuwaappe naagettite yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have no bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta giddon, I hagaa giyoogee nuussi qumi bainna gishshaassa yaagidi haasayaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eti giyoogaa eridi, eta yaagiis; Intteyyo oitti bainnaagaa aissi haasayeetii Ha77inne erekketii Woi akeekekketii Yootin siyekketii

English Sentences: Having eyes, see ye not? and having ears, hear ye not? and do ye not remember?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo aifee de7ees; be7ekketii Qassi haittai de7ees; siyekketii Intteyyo hassayettennee

English Sentences: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ichchashu oittaa ichchashu sha7u asau battido wode, aappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttidetii yaagiis. Yaagin eti, Tammanne naa77u samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttida yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani qassikka laappun oittaa oiddu sha7u asau battido wode, aappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttidetii yaagiis. Yaagin eti, Laappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttida yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, How is it that ye do not understand?
Wolaitta Sentences: I qassi, Ha77inne akeekibeekketii yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he cometh to Bethsaida; and they bring a blind man unto him, and besought him to touch him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Beetasaida giyo katamaa biidosona; amarida asati qooqe bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidi, he bitaniyaa bochchana mala, a woossidosona.

English Sentences: And he took the blind man by the hand, and led him out of the town; and when he had spit on his eyes, and put his hands upon him, he asked him if he saw ought.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qooqe bitaniyaa kushiyaa oiqqidi, qeeri katamaappe gaxaa kessiis; a aifiyan cuchchidi, ba kushiyaa a bolli wottidi, Neeyyo aibakko beettii yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And he looked up, and said, I see men as trees, walking.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee xeellidi, Taani asaa be7ais; shin asai hemettiiddi, mitta milatees yaagiis.

English Sentences: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes, and made him look up: and he was restored, and saw every man clearly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa bitaniyaa aifiyan ba kushiyaa wottin, bitanee loittidi xeelliis; a aifee paxiis; qassi ubbabaakka geeshshidi be7iis.

English Sentences: And he sent him away to his house, saying, Neither go into the town, nor tell it to any in the town.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bitaniyaa a soo yeddiiddi, Harai atto qeeri katamaakka geloppa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus went out, and his disciples, into the towns of Caesarea Philippi: and by the way he asked his disciples, saying unto them, Whom do men say that I am?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Piliphphoosa-Qiisaariyan de7iya qeeri katamata biis; biishin ogiyan Yesuusi, Tana asai oona gii yaagidi ba erissiyo ashkkarata oichchiis.

English Sentences: And they answered, John the Baptist: but some say, Elias; and others, One of the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati, Issi issi asai nena, Xammaqiya Yohaannisa gees; harati, Eelaasa goosona; qassi harati, Hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issuwaa goosona yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am? And Peter answereth and saith unto him, Thou art the Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, Yaanin intte tana oona geetii yaagidi oichchiis. PHeexiroosi, Neeni Kiristtoosa yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, Tabaa ooyyoonne odoppite yaagidi eta azaziis.

English Sentences: And he began to teach them, that the Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders, and of the chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and after three days rise again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, Taani, Asa Na7ai, daro waayettanau bessees; cimati, qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti tana ixxanau bessees; eti tana woranaunne taani heezzantto gallassappe guyyiyan, haiquwaappe denddanau bessees yaagidi tamaarissuwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And he spake that saying openly. And Peter took him, and began to rebuke him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa i etayyo geeshshidi odiis; PHeexiroosi a issi baggi zaaridi, zoretaa doommiis.

English Sentences: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples, he rebuked Peter, saying, Get thee behind me, Satan: for thou savourest not the things that be of God, but the things that be of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi guyye simmidi, ba erissiyo ashkkarata xeellidi PHeexiroosa, Kichcha ta matappe! Ha Seexaanau, neeni asi dosiyoobaa qoppiyoogaappe attin, Xoossai dosiyoobaa qoppakka yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also, he said unto them, Whosoever will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yesuusi daro asaanne ba erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi, hagaadan yaagiis; Tana kaallana koyiya urai de7ikko, bana yeggi bayo; yaatidi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi, tana kaallo.

English Sentences: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ba shemppuwaa ashshana koyiya urai bashshana; shin ta gishshaunne wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa gishshau ba shemppuwaa bashshiya urai ashshana.

English Sentences: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, issi urai sa7an de7iya ubbabaa bau shiishshidi, ba shemppuwaa bashshikko, a ai maaddanee

English Sentences: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi urai ba shemppuwaa wozanau ai immana danddayii

English Sentences: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa ammanenna mala diggiya ha nagaranchcha wodiyan, issi urai tanaaninne ta qaalan yeellatikko, taanikka, Asa Na7ai, qassi ta Aawaa bonchchuwan geeshsha kiitanchchatuura yiyo wode, aani yeellatana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That there be some of them that stand here, which shall not taste of death, till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; amarida asati Xoossaa kawotettai wolqqaara yiyaagaa be7ennan haiqqennaageeti hagan de7oosona yaagiis.

English Sentences: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter, and James, and John, and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves: and he was transfigured before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi usuppun gallassappe guyyiyan, banaara PHeexiroosa, Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa ekkidi, eta xalaalaa gita deriyaa bolli kessiis; kessidi eta sinttan laamettiis;

English Sentences: And his raiment became shining, exceeding white as snow; so as no fuller on earth can white them.
Wolaitta Sentences: a maayoikka phooliis; sa7an maayo meecciya ooninne geeshshanau danddayennaagaa keenaa daro booxxiis.

English Sentences: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses: and they were talking with Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: He heezzu erissiyo ashkkarati, Eelaasinne Muusee Yesuusaara haasayiyaageeta be7idosona.

English Sentences: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Yesuusa, Tamaarissiyaagoo, nuuni hagan de7iyoogee nuussi lo77o; nuuni heezzu zamppata issuwaa neessi, issuwaa Muusessi, qassi issuwaa Eelaasassi zamppayana yaagiis.

English Sentences: For he wist not what to say; for they were sore afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: I woigiyaakkonne eribeenna; aissi giikko, ikko hinkkootikka daro yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them: and a voice came out of the cloud, saying, This is my beloved Son: hear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, shaarai yiidi eta kammin shaaraappe, Hagee taani siiqiyo ta Na7aa; i giyoogaa siyite giya qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: And suddenly, when they had looked round about, they saw no man any more, save Jesus only with themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara eti yuushshi aatti xeelliyo wode, Yesuusappe attin, haraa oonanne bantta matan be7ibookkona.

English Sentences: And as they came down from the mountain, he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen, till the Son of man were risen from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti deriyaappe wodhdhishin, Yesuusi eta, Taani, Asa Na7ai, haiquwaappe denddana gakkanaassi, intte be7idobaa ooyyoonne odoppite yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And they kept that saying with themselves, questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean.
Wolaitta Sentences: I azazidoogaa eti, Eeno giidi, Ha haiquwaappe denddiyoogaa giyoogee woigiyoogee yaagidi, bantta giddon haasayettidosona.

English Sentences: And they asked him, saying, Why say the scribes that Elias must first come?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusa, Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti aissi, Eelaasi kasetidi yaanau bessees giyoonaa yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
Wolaitta Sentences: I zaaridi yaagiis; Eelaasi kaseti yiidi, ubbabaa giigissees; yaatin, aissi Xoossaa maxaafai, Asa Na7ai daro waayettananne ixettana yaagii

English Sentences: But I say unto you, That Elias is indeed come, and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed, as it is written of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo odais; Eelaasi yiis; qassi abai Xoossaa maxaafan xaafettidoogaadankka, asai a ba koyidobaa oottiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he came to his disciples, he saw a great multitude about them, and the scribes questioning with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, PHeexiroosi, Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi hinkko erissiyo ashkkaratukko simmidi yiyo wode, daro asai eta yuuyi aadhdhi eqqidaagaanne higgiyaa tamaarissiya amarida asati etaara palamettiyaageeta be7idosona.

English Sentences: And straightway all the people, when they beheld him, were greatly amazed, and running to him saluted him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He daro asai Yesuusa be7ido wode dagammidi, sohuwaara akko woxxi yiidi, a sarotiis.

English Sentences: And he asked the scribes, What question ye with them?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, Etaara ai palametteetii yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And one of the multitude answered and said, Master, I have brought unto thee my son, which hath a dumb spirit;
Wolaitta Sentences: He daro asaa giddoppe issi bitanee zaaridi, Tamaarissiyaagoo, ta na7aa bolli haasayaa diggiya iita ayyaanai de7iyo gishshau, a neekko ekkada yaas.

English Sentences: And wheresoever he taketh him, he teareth him: and he foameth, and gnasheth with his teeth, and pineth away: and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out; and they could not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha iita ayyaanai a oiqqiyo wode ubban, a ooggees; a doonaarakka hoommoi goppattees; qassi achchaa garccissees; bollaakka zoxissees. Appe ha iita ayyaanaa kessana mala, ne erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo odaas, shin kessanau danddayibookkona yaagiis.

English Sentences: He answereth him, and saith, O faithless generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I suffer you? bring him unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, Ammanenna ha wodiyaa asau! Taani inttenaara aude gakkanaassi de7anee Qassi inttebaa aude gakkanaassi danddayanee Na7aa taakko haa ekki yiite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they brought him unto him: and when he saw him, straightway the spirit tare him; and he fell on the ground, and wallowed foaming.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti na7aa akko ehiidosona; he iita ayyaanai Yesuusa be7idosaarakka na7aa kokkorssi bayiis; na7ai sa7an kunddidi, doonaara hoommoi goppu giishin gonddorettiis.

English Sentences: And he asked his father, How long is it ago since this came unto him? And he said, Of a child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he na7aa aawaa, Hagee ne na7aa oiqqoosappe woqqa wode gidanee yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin, na7aa aawai, I guuttan de7iyo wodeesappe doommiis.

English Sentences: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire, and into the waters, to destroy him: but if thou canst do any thing, have compassion on us, and help us.
Wolaitta Sentences: A woranau daro wode tamaaninne haattan oliis; shin neeni danddayikko, nuuyyo qarettada nuna maaddarkkii yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi a, Neeni danddayikko gai Ammaniya asayyo ubbabai danddayettees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And straightway the father of the child cried out, and said with tears, Lord, I believe; help thou mine unbelief.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara na7aa aawai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Taani ammanais; shin gujja ammananaadan, tana maaddarkkii yaagiis.

English Sentences: When Jesus saw that the people came running together, he rebuked the foul spirit, saying unto him, Thou dumb and deaf spirit, I charge thee, come out of him, and enter no more into him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asai dari dari biyoogaa be7idi, iita ayyaanaa, Ha tullenne duude ayyaanau, ha na7aappe kiya gaada nena ta azazais; qassi naa77anttuwaa aani geloppa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the spirit cried, and rent him sore, and came out of him: and he was as one dead; insomuch that many said, He is dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: He iita ayyaanai waassidi, na7aa keehi kokkorssidi, appe kiyiis. Na7ai haiqqidabaa milatin, daro asai, Na7ai haiqqiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Jesus took him by the hand, and lifted him up; and he arose.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi na7aa kushiyaa oiqqidi denttin, na7ai denddi eqqiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi soo gelidoogaappe guyyiyan, erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa dumma, Nuuni he iita ayyaanaa kessanau aissi danddayibookkonii yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, This kind can come forth by nothing, but by prayer and fasting.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, Hegaa malai woosappenne xoomappe attin, haraban kiyanau danddayenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they departed thence, and passed through Galilee; and he would not that any man should know it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaappe denddidi, Galiilaara aadhdhidi biidosona; Yesuusi ba de7iyoosaa ooninne erana mala koyibeenna.

English Sentences: For he taught his disciples, and said unto them, The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men, and they shall kill him; and after that he is killed, he shall rise the third day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i ba erissiyo ashkkarata, Tana, Asa Na7aa, asi asau aattidi immananne worana; taani qassi heezzu gallassappe guyyiyan, naa77anttuwaa haiquwaappe denddana yaagidi tamaarissees.

English Sentences: But they understood not that saying, and were afraid to ask him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin etau i giyoogee gelibeenna; qassi a oichchanaukka yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And he came to Capernaum: and being in the house he asked them, What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa biidosona; biidi soo gelidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi eta, Ogiyan ai haasayeetii yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: But they held their peace: for by the way they had disputed among themselves, who should be the greatest.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti biidi ogiyan, Nu giddon nu ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagee oonee yaagidi palamettido gishshau, co77u giidosona.

English Sentences: And he sat down, and called the twelve, and saith unto them, If any man desire to be first, the same shall be last of all, and servant of all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi uttidi, tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata xeesidi eta, Ooninne sinttau aadhdhana koyikko, ubbaappe guyye aadhdhidi, he ubbau ashkkara gidanau bessees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took a child, and set him in the midst of them: and when he had taken him in his arms, he said unto them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi guutta na7aa oiqqidi, eta giddon essiis; he guutta na7aa qoommidi eta,

English Sentences: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name, receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me, receiveth not me, but him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageetu mala guutta naatuppe issuwaa ta sunttan mokkiya ooninne tana mokkees; qassi tana mokkiya ooninne tana kiittidaagaa mokkiyoogaappe attin, ta xalaalaa mokkenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: And John answered him, saying, Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name, and he followeth not us: and we forbad him, because he followeth not us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi a, Tamaarissiyaagoo, issi asi ne sunttan xalaheta kessiyaagaa nuuni be7idi, nu bagga gidenna gishshau, a diggida yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Jesus said, Forbid him not: for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name, that can lightly speak evil of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi yaagiis; Ooninne ta sunttan Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottidi, sohuwaara ta bolli iitabaa haasayanau danddayiyaabi bainna gishshau diggoppite;

English Sentences: For he that is not against us is on our part.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, nubaa ixxenna urai nu bagga.

English Sentences: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because ye belong to Christ, verily I say unto you, he shall not lose his reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intte taageeta Kiristtoosaageeta gidiyo gishshau, ooninne intteyyo ta sunttan bule haatta uyanau immikkokka, ba woituwaa ekkana.

English Sentences: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me, it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and he were cast into the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ammaniya ha guuttatuppe issuwaa balettiya oonanne, gaacciyo wogga woxaa a qooriyan qachchidi, abban a oliyoogee au keha.

English Sentences: And if thy hand offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed, than having two hands to go into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kushee nena balettikko, qanxxa ola; neeni naa77u kushiyaara guxunee mule haiqqennasaanne qassi mulekka to77enna Gaannabiyaa taman geliyoogaappe,

English Sentences: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
Wolaitta Sentences: duuxa kushiyaara de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha.

English Sentences: And if thy foot offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter halt into life, than having two feet to be cast into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne tohoi nena balettikko, qanxxa ola; neeni naa77u tohuwaara guxunee mule haiqqennasan, qassi mulekka to77enna Gaannabiyaa taman yegettiyoogaappe,

English Sentences: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
Wolaitta Sentences: wobbe gidada de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha.

English Sentences: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out: it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye, than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aifee nena balettikko, wooca ola; neeni naa77u aifiyaara guxunee mule haiqqennasan qassi mulekka to77enna Gaannabiyaa taman yegettiyoogaappe,

English Sentences: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
Wolaitta Sentences: issi aifiyaara Xoossaa kawotettaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha.

English Sentences: For every one shall be salted with fire, and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, quman maxiniyaa yeggiyoogaadan, tamai asa ubbaa bolli yegettana.

English Sentences: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his saltness, wherewith will ye season it? Have salt in yourselves, and have peace one with another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maxinee lo77o; shin i mal77ana xayikko, zaaridi a waati mal77ettuuteetii Inttenan maxinee de7o; yaatidi issoi issuwaara sarotettan de7ite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he arose from thence, and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan: and the people resort unto him again; and, as he was wont, he taught them again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaappe denddidi, Yihudaa biitti biis; biidi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinniis. Daro asai naa77anttuwaa akko shiiqin, kaseegaadankka he asaa tamaarissuwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And the Pharisees came to him, and asked him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife? tempting him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi Parisaaweti paaccanau Yesuusakko yiidi, Issi asi ba machchiyo yeddanau nu higgee azazii yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto them, What did Moses command you?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin i zaaridi, Muusee inttena woigi azazidee yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement, and to put her away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, Muusee, Issi asi ba machcheeyyo paramaa immidi yeddo giis yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; Intte yootin siyennaageeta gidiyo gishshau, Muusee ha azazuwaa intteyyo xaafiis.

English Sentences: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai koiro medhdhiyo wode, attumaasanne maccaasa oottidi, eta medhdhiis.

English Sentences: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, issi asi ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo aggi bayidi, ba machcheera issippe de7ees;

English Sentences: And they twain shall be one flesh: so then they are no more twain, but one flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: eti naa77ai issi asa gidoosona; hegaa gishshau, eti issi asa gidiyoogaappe attin, naa77u asa gidokkona.

English Sentences: What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai issippe gattidoogaa asi shaakkoppo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti soo simmido wode, erissiyo ashkkarati ha yohuwaabaa Yesuusa naa77anttuwaa oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta yaagiis; Ba machchiyo yeddidi, haranniyo ekkiya urai ooninne ba machchen shaaramuxees.

English Sentences: And if a woman shall put away her husband, and be married to another, she committeth adultery.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi maccaarakka ba azinaappe kiyada hara azinaa gelikko shaaramuxausu yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they brought young children to him, that he should touch them: and his disciples rebuked those that brought them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi guutta naata bochchana mala, issi issi asai naata akko ehees; shin erissiyo ashkkarati he asaa hanqqettidosona.

English Sentences: But when Jesus saw it, he was much displeased, and said unto them, Suffer the little children to come unto me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa be7idi, ba erissiyo ashkkarata hanqqettiis; eta, Guutta naati taakko yiyoogaa diggoppite; aissi giikko, Xoossaa kawotettai hageetu malaassa.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child, he shall not enter therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; Xoossaa kawotettaa guutta na7adan ekkenna urai ooninne he kawotettaa mulekka gelenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi guutta naata qoommidi, ba kushiyaa eta bolli huuphiyan huuphiyan wottidi, eta anjjiis.

English Sentences: And when he was gone forth into the way, there came one running, and kneeled to him, and asked him, Good Master, what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi baanau kiyido wode, issi bitanee woxxiiddi yiidi, a sinttan gulbbatidi, Lo77o tamaarissiyaagoo, merinaa de7uwaa laattanau taani ai oottoo yaagidi a oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi, Aissi tana lo77uwau gai Xoossaa xalaalaappe attin, hara lo77oi ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: Thou knowest the commandments, Do not commit adultery, Do not kill, Do not steal, Do not bear false witness, Defraud not, Honour thy father and mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa azazuwaa, Woroppa; shaaramuxoppa; wuuqqoppa; wordduwaa markkattoppa; cimmoppa; ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha yaagiyaagaa eraasa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto him, Master, all these have I observed from my youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee Yesuusa, Tamaarissiyaagoo, taani hegaa ubbaa naatettaasappe doommada ha77i gakkanaassikka naagais yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus beholding him loved him, and said unto him, One thing thou lackest: go thy way, sell whatsoever thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come, take up the cross, and follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bitaniyaa dosiis; tishshi ootti xeellidi, Neeyyo issibai paccees; baada neeyyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa baizzada, he miishshaa hiyyeesau imma; neeni saluwan duretana. Yaatada yaada tana kaalla yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he was sad at that saying, and went away grieved: for he had great possessions.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin bitanee hegaa siyidi, i daro dure gidiyo gishshau, ba som77uwaa xumissidi, ufaittennan aggi bayidi biis.

English Sentences: And Jesus looked round about, and saith unto his disciples, How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God!
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata yuushshi aatti xeellidi, Daro dure asi Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagee waani metanddeeshsha! yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the disciples were astonished at his words. But Jesus answereth again, and saith unto them, Children, how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God!
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati a haasayaa siyidi garamettidosona; shin Yesuusi qassikka eta, Naatoo, miishshan ammanettiya asatuyyo Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagee woqqaa metanddeeshsha!

English Sentences: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dure asi Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagaappe, gaameelai marppiyaa xoo7iyaara aadhdhanaagee matattees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they were astonished out of measure, saying among themselves, Who then can be saved?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin erissiyo ashkkarati garamettidi, Yaatin, ooni attanau danddayii yaagidi issoi issuwaa oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus looking upon them saith, With men it is impossible, but not with God: for with God all things are possible.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta tishshi ootti xeellidi, Hagee Xoossau danddayettiyoogaappe attin, asau danddayettenna; aissi giikko, Xoossau ubbabaikka danddayettees yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Yesuusa, Be7a; nuuni nubaa ubbaa aggi bayidi, nena kaallida yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi yaagiis; Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; ta gishshaunne wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa gishshau, keettaa woi ishantta woi michchentta, woi aawaa woi aayyiyo woi machchiyo, woi naata woi gadiyaa aggida asi ooninne,

English Sentences: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time, houses, and brethren, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and lands, with persecutions; and in the world to come eternal life.
Wolaitta Sentences: ha77i ha wodiyan xeetutooppe dariya keettata, ishantta, michchentta, aayeta, naata, gadiyaa, qassi waayiyaakka ekkana. Sinttappe yaana wodiyankka merinaa de7uwaa ekkana.

English Sentences: But many that are first shall be last; and the last first.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin daroti ha77i sinttan de7iyaageeti guyye aadhdhana; qassi daroti ha77i guyyen de7iyaageeti sinttau aadhdhana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem; and Jesus went before them: and they were amazed; and as they followed, they were afraid. And he took again the twelve, and began to tell them what things should happen unto him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yerusalaame biiddi, ogiyan de7oosona; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe sinttan hemettees. Eti garamettidosona; a kaallidaageetikka yayyidosona. Naa77anttuwaa tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata gaxaa kessidi, bana gakkanabaa dumma etassi hagaadan yaagidi odiis;

English Sentences: Saying, Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests, and unto the scribes; and they shall condemn him to death, and shall deliver him to the Gentiles:
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite; nuuni Yerusalaame ha77i kiyeettees; yaani tana, Asa Na7aa, qeese halaqatussinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetussi aattidi immana. Eti ta bolli haiqo pirddaa pirddana; qassi Aihuda gidenna asaassikka tana aattidi immana.

English Sentences: And they shall mock him, and shall scourge him, and shall spit upon him, and shall kill him: and the third day he shall rise again.
Wolaitta Sentences: He Aihuda gidenna asai ta bolli qilliiccananne cuchchana; tana lissuwan garafananne worana; taani qassi heezzu gallassappe guyyiyan, haiquwaappe denddana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And James and John, the sons of Zebedee, come unto him, saying, Master, we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zabddiyoosa naati Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi Yesuusakko yiidi, Tamaarissiyaagoo, nuuni nena woossiyo ubbabaa nuuyyo oottarkkii yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Taani intteyyo ai oottoo yaagiis.

English Sentences: They said unto him, Grant unto us that we may sit, one on thy right hand, and the other on thy left hand, in thy glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti a, Ne bonchcho kawotettan neeni uttiyo wode, nuuppe issuwaa neeppe ushachcha baggaara qassi issuwaa haddirssa baggaara utissarkkii yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus said unto them, Ye know not what ye ask: can ye drink of the cup that I drink of? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta, Intte ai woossiyaakkonne erekketa; taani uyanau bessiyo burccukkuwan uyanau danddayeetii Qassi taani xammaqettanau bessiyo xinqqatiyaa xammaqettanau danddayeetii yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said unto him, We can. And Jesus said unto them, Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti zaaridi, Ee danddayoos yaagidosona. Yesuusi qassi, Taani uyanau bessiyo burccukkuwan intte uyana; taani xammaqettanau bessiyo xinqqatiyaakka intte xammaqettana.

English Sentences: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taappe ushachcha baggaaranne haddirssa baggaara uttanaageeta dooranau taayyo maati baawa; shin he sohoi Xoossai immanau giigissi wottidoogeetussa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the ten heard it, they began to be much displeased with James and John.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hankko tammu erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyido wode, Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa hanqqettidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus called them to him, and saith unto them, Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and their great ones exercise authority upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta ubbaa baakko xeesidi, hagaadan yaagiis; Aihuda gidennaageeta haariyaageeta giidi qoppiyoogeetinne hegeeta kaalettiya asati bantta asaa haariyoogaa ereeta.

English Sentences: But so shall it not be among you: but whosoever will be great among you, shall be your minister:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte giddon hegaa mala gidenna; intte giddon gitatana koyiyai ooninne intteyyo ashkkara gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest, shall be servant of all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte giddon ubbaappe bolla gidana koyiyai ooninne intte ubbaayyo aille gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, harai atto taani, Asa Na7aikka, asau oottanaunne darota wozanau ta shemppuwaa immanaunne yiidoogaappe attin, asi tau oottanau yabeikke yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they came to Jericho: and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people, blind Bartimaeus, the son of Timaeus, sat by the highway side begging.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yarkko giyo katamaa biidosona; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuuranne keehi daro asaara Yarkkoppe kiyishin, Ximoosa na7ai qooqee, Barxximoosa giyoogee, ogiyaa doonan woossiiddi uttiis.

English Sentences: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth, he began to cry out, and say, Jesus, thou son of David, have mercy on me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Barxximoosi Naazireeta Yesuusa gididoogaa siyidi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Daawita na7aa Yesuusaa, tana maararkkii! yaagettaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou son of David, have mercy on me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai a, Haizza! giidi hanqqettiis. SHin, i ba qaalaa kaseegaappekka keehi xoqqu oottidi, Daawita na7au, tana maararkkii! yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus stood still, and commanded him to be called. And they call the blind man, saying unto him, Be of good comfort, rise; he calleth thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ogiyan eqqidi, A haa xeesite yaagiis. Yaagin eti qooqiyaa, Aikko baawa; dendda eqqa; nena xeesees yaagidi xeesidosona.

English Sentences: And he, casting away his garment, rose, and came to Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qooqee ba maayuwaa oli bayidi, guppi denddi eqqidi, Yesuusakko biis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, Taani neeyyo ai oottanau koyai yaagiis. Yaagin qooqee, Tamaarissiyaagoo, taani xeellanaagaa koyais yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Go thy way; thy faith hath made thee whole. And immediately he received his sight, and followed Jesus in the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi a, Ba; ne ammanoi nena pattiis yaagiis. Sohuwaarakka a aifee xeelli aggin, ogiyan Yesuusa kaalli bayiis.

English Sentences: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem, unto Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount of Olives, he sendeth forth two of his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yerusalaame matiiddi, Dabira Zaite Deriyaa lanqqiyan de7iya Beetafaaganne Biitaaniyaa giyo katamata gakkidosona; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa sinttau kiittidi,

English Sentences: And saith unto them, Go your way into the village over against you: and as soon as ye be entered into it, ye shall find a colt tied, whereon never man sat; loose him, and bring him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteppe sinttan de7iya qeeri katamaa biite; biidi yaa gelosaara ooninne mulekka toggibeenna qashuwan de7iya hare maraa intte demmana; a birshshidi, haa ekkidi yiite.

English Sentences: And if any man say unto you, Why do ye this? say ye that the Lord hath need of him; and straightway he will send him hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne inttena, Hegaa aissi ootteetii yaagidi oichchikko, Godai hagaa koyees; sohuwaara zaaridi, haa yeddi bayana yaagite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they went their way, and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met; and they loose him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biidi, hare maraa penggiyaa matan ogiyan qachchi wottidoogaa demmidi birshshidosona.

English Sentences: And certain of them that stood there said unto them, What do ye, loosing the colt?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan eqqida issi issi asati eta, Hare maraa waatanau birshsheetii yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded: and they let them go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttana azazidoogaa yootin, asati yeddi bayidosona.

English Sentences: And they brought the colt to Jesus, and cast their garments on him; and he sat upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hare maraa Yesuusakko ehiidi, bantta maayuwaa a zokkuwan hiixxidosona; hiixxin Yesuusi he hare maraa toggiis.

English Sentences: And many spread their garments in the way: and others cut down branches off the trees, and strawed them in the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai ba maayuwaa ogiyan hiixxiis; qassi harati mittaa tashiyaa kari karidi, ogiyan hiixxidosona.

English Sentences: And they that went before, and they that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusappe sinttaara hemettiya asainne a geeduwaa kaalliya asai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Xoossai galatetto! Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David, that cometh in the name of the Lord: Hosanna in the highest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa sunttan yiya nu aawaa Daawita kawotettai anjjettidaagaa. Salo ubbaappe bolla saluwan de7iya Xoossai galatetto yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem, and into the temple: and when he had looked round about upon all things, and now the eventide was come, he went out unto Bethany with the twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Yerusalaame biidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis; qassi ubbabaa yuuyi yuuyi xeellidoogaappe guyyiyan, sa7ai qammiyo gishshau, tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuura Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa biis.

English Sentences: And on the morrow, when they were come from Bethany, he was hungry:
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi eti Biitaaniyaappe kiyidi biishin, Yesuusi namisettiis.

English Sentences: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves, he came, if haply he might find any thing thereon: and when he came to it, he found nothing but leaves; for the time of figs was not yet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haahuwan issi balase giyo mittiyo tashiyaa maaya uttidaaro be7idi, geelladan i bolli aifee beettikkonne giidi, be7anau ikko biis; shin ikko i biyo wode, tashe xalaalaappe attin, ainne aife demmibeenna; aissi giikko, balasee aifiyo wodee gakkibeenna.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto it, No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever. And his disciples heard it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he balasiyo, Neeppe naa77antto merinau asi aife mooppo yaagiis. Erissiyo ashkkarati i giyoogaa siyidosona.

English Sentences: And they come to Jerusalem: and Jesus went into the temple, and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yerusalaame biidosona; Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi, hegan baizziyaageetanne shammiyaageeta kare yedetaa doommiis; qassi miishshaa laammiyaageetu xaraphpheezaanne haraphphiyaa baizziyaageetu oidiyaa aatti yeggidi,

English Sentences: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: ooninne aibakko tookkidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddoora aadhdhanaagaa diggiis.

English Sentences: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asaa hagaadan yaagidi tamaarissiis; Xoossaa maxaafan, Ta keettai Aihuda gidenna asai ubbai Xoossaa woossiyo keetta geetettana yaagettidi xaafetti uttiis; shin intte a panggati qosettiyo gonggolo kessideta yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the scribes and chief priests heard it, and sought how they might destroy him: for they feared him, because all the people was astonished at his doctrine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti hegaa siyidi, a xaissana ogiyaa koshshaa doommidosona; shin keehi daro asai i tamaarissiyoogan garamettiyo gishshau, ayyo yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And when even was come, he went out of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omarido wode, Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati katamaappe gaxaa kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And in the morning, as they passed by, they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wonttetta gallassi maallado ogiyaara aadhdhiiddi, he balasiyaa xaphuwaara melaichchidaaro be7idosona.

English Sentences: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him, Master, behold, the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi hassayidi, Tamaarissiyaagoo, be7a; neeni qanggido balasiyaa melaichchaasu yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; Xoossaa ammanite.

English Sentences: For verily I say unto you, That whosoever shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; and shall not doubt in his heart, but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass; he shall have whatsoever he saith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; ooninne ba wozanan sirennan ba giidobai hananaagaa ammanidi, ha deriyaa, Denddada abban kundda giikko hanana.

English Sentences: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani intteyyo odais; Xoossaa intte woossiyoobaanne oichchiyoobaa ubbaanne ekkirggidobaadan ammanite; intte ekkana.

English Sentences: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa woossanau intte eqqiyo wode, saluwan de7iya intte Aawai intte nagaraa atto gaana mala, ooninne inttena naaqqidobai de7ikko, au atto giite.

English Sentences: But if ye do not forgive, neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asa nagara intte atto gaana xayikko, saluwan de7iya intte Aawaikka intte nagaraa intteyyo atto geenna yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they come again to Jerusalem: and as he was walking in the temple, there come to him the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti qassikka Yerusalaame biidosona; Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan hemetettishin, qeese halaqati, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati akko yiidosona.

English Sentences: And say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi a, Neeni hagaa oottanau neeyyo ai alaafetetti de7ii Woi neeyyo ha alaafetettaa immidai oonee yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I will also ask of you one question, and answer me, and I will tell you by what authority I do these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, Taanikka inttena issibaa oichchana; tau odite; taani qassi hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko, intteyyo odana.

English Sentences: The baptism of John, was it from heaven, or of men? answer me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi xammaqiyo alaafetettaa ekkidoi Xoossaappeeyye woi asappee Tau odite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta giddon palamaa doommidi, Nuuni, Xoossaappe yiis yaagikko, i nuna, Yaatin, Yohaannisi yootidoogaa aissi ammanibeekketii yaagana.

English Sentences: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin, Asappe yiis gaanee yaagidosona; qassi asai ubbai Yohaannisi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gididoogaa eriyo gishshau, asau yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And they answered and said unto Jesus, We cannot tell. And Jesus answering saith unto them, Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti Yesuusayyo, Nuuni erokko yaagidi zaaridosona; Yesuusi, Taanikka hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko, intteyyo odikke yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he began to speak unto them by parables. A certain man planted a vineyard, and set an hedge about it, and digged a place for the winefat, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etayyo oduwaa leemisuwan yaagidi doommiis; Issi bitanee woiniyaa giyo turaa tokkidi, dirssaa yuushshi aattidi diriis; qassi he woiniyaa gum77iyo ollaakka bookkiis; hegaa naagiya asaayyo adussa shuchchaa gimbbiis; hegaappe guyyiyan, kottaa oottiya asau immidi, hara dere biis.

English Sentences: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa aifiyaa maxiyo wodee gakkin, bana gakkiyaagaa ekkidi yaana mala, issi ashkkaraa ba kottaawatukko kiittiis.

English Sentences: And they caught him, and beat him, and sent him away empty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kottaa oottiyaageeti a ashkkaraa oiqqidi wadhdhidi, kushe mela yedettidosona.

English Sentences: And again he sent unto them another servant; and at him they cast stones, and wounded him in the head, and sent him away shamefully handled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77anttuwaa hara ashkkaraa etakko kiittiis; kiittin eti he ashkkaraassi huuphiyaa qoo7idinne kaushshidi yeddidosona.

English Sentences: And again he sent another; and him they killed, and many others; beating some, and killing some.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa turaa godai qassikka hara ashkkaraa kiittiis; he ashkkaraa woridosona; qassi hara darotakka hegaadan oottidosona; issuwaa issuwaa wadhdhidi, harata woridosona.

English Sentences: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa turaa godaayyo kiittanau ubbaappe wurssettan i daro siiqiyo a na7aa xalaalai attiis; i, Eti ta na7aa bonchchennan aggokkona giidi, ba na7aa etakko kiittiis.

English Sentences: But those husbandmen said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill him, and the inheritance shall be our's.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kottaa oottiyaageeti bantta giddon, Laattanaagee hagaa; hinddite a woroos; a aqoi nubaa gidana! yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they took him, and killed him, and cast him out of the vineyard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aa oiqqidi woridi, a ahaa woiniyaa turaa giddoppe gaxaa kessi olidosona.

English Sentences: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do? he will come and destroy the husbandmen, and will give the vineyard unto others.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi woiniyaa turaa godai waatanee Yiidi he kottaawata wori wurssidi, woiniyaa turaa kottaa oottiya hara asau immana.

English Sentences: And have ye not read this scripture; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai godaa xaphuwaa minttiya, ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis.

English Sentences: This was the Lord's doing, and it is marvellous in our eyes?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee Godai oottidobaa; qassi nu aifiyaukka garamissiyaabaa yaagiyaagaa Xoossaa maxaafaappe nabbabibeekketii yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqati, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati Yesuusi he leemisuwaa banttanan leemisidoogaa erido gishshau, a oiqqanau koyidosona; shin asau yayyidi, aggi bayidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, to catch him in his words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi a haasayaappe bala demmidi, a oiqqana mala, Parisaawetuppenne Heeroodisa baggatuppe amaridaageeta akko kiittidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come, they say unto him, Master, we know that thou art true, and carest for no man: for thou regardest not the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth: Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar, or not?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin yiidi, Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni tumaa haasayiyoogaanne asappe asa shaakkennaagaa nuuni eroos; aissi giikko, neeni asa dummayakka; qassi Xoossaa ogiyaa tumatettan tamaarissaasa. Nuuni Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaarayyo giiraa giiriyoogee wogeeyye woga gidennee Giiraa giiraneeyye digganee yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti lo77o milatiya iita asa gididoogaa Yesuusi eridi, Tana aissi paacceetii Issi santtimiyaa haa ehiite; taani be7ais yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they brought it. And he saith unto them, Whose is this image and superscription? And they said unto him, Caesar's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti au ehiidosona; Ha merainne sunttai oogee yaagidi eta oichchidosona. Oichchin eti, Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaaraagaa yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto them, vRender to Caesar the things that are Caesar's, and to God the things that are God's. And they marvelled at him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, Yaatikko, Qeesaaraagaa Qeesaarassi, Xoossaagaa Xoossaassi immite yaagin eti abaa garamettidosona.

English Sentences: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection; and they asked him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqida asi denddenna giya Saaduqaawetuppe issi issi asati Yesuusakko yiidi, hagaadan yaagidi, a oichchidosona;

English Sentences: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tamaarissiyaagoo, Muusee nuuyyo higgiyaa xaafiiddi, Machcho ekkida asi na7a yelennan haiqqikko, he haiqqidaagaa ishai a machchiyo aissidi, ba ishaayyo na7a yelanau bessees yaagiyaagaa xaafiis.

English Sentences: Now there were seven brethren: and the first took a wife, and dying left no seed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi wode laappun ishantti de7iyaageetuppe bairai machchiyo ekkidi, na7a yelennan haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the second took her, and died, neither left he any seed: and the third likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqin naa77anttoi o aissiis; ikka na7a yelennan haiqqiis; heezzanttoikka hegaadan haniis.

English Sentences: And the seven had her, and left no seed: last of all the woman died also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappunatikka o ekkidi, na7a yelennan haiqqidosona; ubbaappe guyyiyan, qassi he maccaasiyaa haiqqaasu.

English Sentences: In the resurrection therefore, when they shall rise, whose wife shall she be of them? for the seven had her to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi, a etappe augaayyo machcho gidanee Aissi giikko, laappunatikka o ekkidosona yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto them, Do ye not therefore err, because ye know not the scriptures, neither the power of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; Intte baliyoogee, Xoossaa maxaafatanne Xoossaa wolqqaa intte erenna gishshaassa!

English Sentences: For when they shall rise from the dead, they neither marry, nor are given in marriage; but are as the angels which are in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi, saluwan de7iya kiitanchchatu mala gidanaagaappe attin, attuma asinne ekkenna; macca asinne gelenna.

English Sentences: And as touching the dead, that they rise: have ye not read in the book of Moses, how in the bush God spake unto him, saying, I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin haiqqidaageetu dendduwaabaa gidikko, Muuse maxaafan xaafettida xaragettiya buuraabaa odiya sohuwan, Xoossai Muusa, Taani Abrahaama Xoossaa, Yisaaqa Xoossaa, Yaaqooba Xoossaa giidoogaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii

English Sentences: He is not the God of the dead, but the God of the living: ye therefore do greatly err.
Wolaitta Sentences: I paxa de7iyaageetu Xoossaa gidiyoogaappe attin, haiqqidaageetu Xoossaa gidenna; intte keehi balideta yaagiis.

English Sentences: And one of the scribes came, and having heard them reasoning together, and perceiving that he had answered them well, asked him, Which is the first commandment of all?
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe issoi eti palamettiyoogaa shiiqidi siyiis; qassi Yesuusi etayyo loitti zaaridoogaa siyidi, Azazo ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazoi augee yaagidi Yesuusa oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered him, The first of all the commandments is, Hear, O Israel; The Lord our God is one Lord:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, a hagaadan yaagiis; Azazo ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazuwaa siyite; Israa7eela asau, Godai nu Xoossai issi Godaa.

English Sentences: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind, and with all thy strength: this is the first commandment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Godaa intte Xoossaa intte kumetta wozanaappe, intte kumetta shemppuwaappe, intte kumetta qofaappe, intte kumetta wolqqaappe siiqite yaagees.

English Sentences: And the second is like, namely this, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself. There is none other commandment greater than these.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi azazo ubbaappe aadhdhiya naa77antto azazoi hagaa; Neeni ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa giyaagaa; hageetuppe aadhdhiya hara azazoi baawa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the scribe said unto him, Well, Master, thou hast said the truth: for there is one God; and there is none other but he:
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagee Yesuusa yaagiis; Tamaarissiyaagoo, tumaa gaadasa; neeni Xoossai issi Xoossaa xalaala. Appe attin, hari baawa giidoogee tuma.

English Sentences: And to love him with all the heart, and with all the understanding, and with all the soul, and with all the strength, and to love his neighbour as himself, is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa kumetta wozanaappe, kumetta qofaappenne kumetta wolqqaappe siiqiyoogeenne qassi ba shooruwaakka ba huuphedan siiqiyoogee, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaappenne hara yarshsho ubbaappe aadhdhees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly, he said unto him, Thou art not far from the kingdom of God. And no man after that durst ask him any question.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagaa zaaroi aadhdhida eranchcha asa zaaro gididoogaa be7idi, Neeni Xoossaa kawotettaappe haakkabaakka yaagiis; hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusa harabaa oichchanau ooninne xalibeenna.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiiddi, hagaadan yaagiis; Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti Kiristtoosa woigidi Daawita na7a giyoonaa

English Sentences: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost, The LORD said to my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, till I make thine enemies thy footstool.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti bana Geeshsha Ayyaanai haasayissin, Godai ta Godaa, Taani ne morkketa neeni yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi, hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta giis yaagiis.

English Sentences: David therefore himself calleth him Lord; and whence is he then his son? And the common people heard him gladly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba huuphen Kiristtoosa, Godaa giidi xeesikko, yaatin, Kiristtoosi waanidi, Daawita na7a gidii yaagiis. Daro asai Yesuusi giyoogaa ufaissan siyiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them in his doctrine, Beware of the scribes, which love to go in long clothing, and love salutations in the marketplaces,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi tamaarissiiddi, hagaadan yaagiis; Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe naagettite; eti adussa maayuwaa maayidi yuuyiyoogaanne giyaa sohuwankka asai eta bonchchidi sarotiyoogaa dosoosona.

English Sentences: And the chief seats in the synagogues, and the uppermost rooms at feasts:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Aihuda woosa keettatun daro lo77iya oidiyaa dosoosona; qassi asi banttana imattiyoosankka bonchcho sohuwaa dosoosona.

English Sentences: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti am77etu keettaa bonqqidi, banttau lo77o milatanau Xoossaa woosaa adussoosona; eti ubbaappe aadhdhiya pirddaa ekkana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus sat over against the treasury, and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury: and many that were rich cast in much.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan muxuwaataa yeggiyo saaxiniyaa matan uttidi, asai ba miishshaa he saaxiniyan yeggiyoogaa be7iis; daro dure asai daro miishshaa he saaxiniyan yeggees.

English Sentences: And there came a certain poor widow, and she threw in two mites, which make a farthing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi hiyyeesa am77iyaa yaada, issi santtimiyan laamettiya naa77u bakkannata he saaxiniyan yeggaasu.

English Sentences: And he called unto him his disciples, and saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, That this poor widow hath cast more in, than all they which have cast into the treasury:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata xeesidi, Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; muxuwaataa saaxiniyan yeggida asa ubbaappe ha hiyyeesa am77iyaa darissada yeggaasu.

English Sentences: For all they did cast in of their abundance; but she of her want did cast in all that she had, even all her living.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, harati ubbai banttau palahida miishshaappe yeggidosona; shin a ba pacaappe, bau de7iya aquwaa muleera imma aggaasu yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as he went out of the temple, one of his disciples saith unto him, Master, see what manner of stones and what buildings are here!
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyishin, erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi a, Tamaarissiyaagoo, hagee aiba lo77o shuchchakkonne qassi aiba lo77o shuchcha keettakko be7ai! yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto him, Seest thou these great buildings? there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, Ha gita shuchcha keettata be7ai Ha keettatun de7iya issi shuchchinne attennan ubbai qolettana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaappe hini baggaara Dabira Zaite Deriyaa bolli uttidaashin, PHeexiroosi, Yaaqoobi, Yohaannisinne Inddiraasi banttarkka akko yiidi a,

English Sentences: Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee aude hananaakko, nuuyyo odarkkii; qassi hegee ubbai polettana wodiyaa erissiya malaatai aiba gidanee yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering them began to say, Take heed lest any man deceive you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassi etayyo hagaadan yaagidi, oduwaa doommiis; Inttena ooninne balettenna mala naagettite.

English Sentences: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asati ta sunttan, Taani Kiristtoosa yaagiiddi yaana; yiidi daro asaa balettana.

English Sentences: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars, be ye not troubled: for such things must needs be; but the end shall not be yet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Matan de7iya olaa cenggurssaanne haahuwan de7iya olaa oduwaa intte siyiyo wode, hirggoppite; hegaa malabai hananau bessees; shin wurssettai biroona.

English Sentences: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, issi biittaa asai hara biittaa asaara olettana; qassi issi kawotettai hara kawotettaara olettana; biittaa qaattai ubbasan de7ana; koshaikka de7ana; shin hegee koiro leesso mala.

English Sentences: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte intte huuphen naagettite; aissi giikko, asi inttena oiqqidi, pirdda keettau aattidi immana; qassi ba Aihuda woosa keettatunkka inttena lissuwan garafana; deriyaa haariyaageetu sinttaaninne kawotu sinttan ta gishshau intte markkattanau eqqana.

English Sentences: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi koiroora dere ubbau odettiichchanau bessees.

English Sentences: But when they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti inttena pirdda keettaa ehiyo wodenne aattidi immiyo wode, woigidi haasayanaakkonne koiroora hirggoppite; he saatiyan Xoossai intteyyo immiyoobaa haasayite. Aissi giikko, Geeshsha Ayyaanai haasayanaappe attin, haasayiyaageeti inttena gidekketa.

English Sentences: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishai ba ishaa, aawai ba na7aa worissana; qassi naati bantta aawatu bollinne bantta aayetu bolli denddidi, eta worissana.

English Sentences: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai inttena ta sunttaa gishshau ixxana; shin wurssettai gakkanaashin gencciyaagee attana.

English Sentences: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, standing where it ought not, (let him that readeth understand,) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hananabaa yootiya Daaneeli odido bashshaa tunatettai eqqanau bessennasan eqqidaashin intte be7iyo wode, hegee woigiyoogaakko, nabbabiyaagee akeeko; Yihudaa biittan he wode de7iyaageeti deriyaakko baqatona.

English Sentences: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettaa huuphiyan de7iya uraikka issibaa ekkanau duge wodhdhidi, ba soo geloppo.

English Sentences: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaden de7iyaageekka ba maayuwaa ekkanau guyye simmoppo.

English Sentences: But woe to them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode shahaara maccaasatuyyoonne xanttiya maccaasatuyyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hagee ubbai haniyo wodee balggo gidenna mala, Xoossaa woossite;

English Sentences: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, Xoossai sa7aa koiro medhdhoosappe doommidi, ha77i gakkanaassi, mulekka de7ibeenna metoi, qassi hagaappe sinttaukka mule de7enna metoi asaa bolli he wode de7ana.

English Sentences: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai he gallassatu qoodaa guuttiyoi bainnaakko, asa gididai ooninne attenna; shin i ba doorido asatu gishshau, he gallassatu qoodaa guuttiis.

English Sentences: And then if any man shall say to you, Lo, here is Christ; or, lo, he is there; believe him not:
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode ooninne inttena, Be7ite; Kiristtoosi hagan de7ees woi, Be7ite; Kiristtoosi hegan de7ees yaagikko, hegaa ammanoppite.

English Sentences: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, worddanchcha Kiristtoosatinne wordduwaa hananabaa yootiyaageeti denddana; denddidi banttau danddayettikko, harai atto Xoossai dooridoogeetakka balettanau malaataanne garamissiyaabaa bessana.

English Sentences: But take ye heed: behold, I have foretold you all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte naagettite; taani intteyyo ubbabaa kasetada odaas.

English Sentences: But in those days, after that tribulation, the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he wode he waayiyaappe guyyiyan, awai xumana; aginai poo7iyoogaa aggi bayana;

English Sentences: And the stars of heaven shall fall, and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken.
Wolaitta Sentences: xoolintteti saluwaappe kunddana; qassi saluwan de7iya wolqqatikka qaaxettana.

English Sentences: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani, Asa Na7ai, gita wolqqaaranne bonchchuwaara shaaraa giddoora yiishin, eti be7ana.

English Sentences: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani kiitanchchata sa7aa oiddu zooziyaa kiittana; kiittada sa7aa gaxaappe saluwaa gaxaa gakkanaashin, Xoossai doorido asaa shiishshana.

English Sentences: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When her branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is near:
Wolaitta Sentences: Leemisuwaa balasiyo giyo mitteeppe akeekite; balasiyaa aaciyo wodenne i tashee bonccottiyo wode, bonee matattidoogaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: So ye in like manner, when ye shall see these things come to pass, know that it is nigh, even at the doors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka intte he ubbabai haniyoogaa be7iyo wode, i matattidi pengge shiiqidoogaa erite.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, that this generation shall not pass, till all these things be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ha ubbabai hanana gakkanaassi, ha wodiyaa asai haiqqiichchenna.

English Sentences: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloinne sa7ai aadhdhana; shin ta qaalai mulekka aadhdhenna.

English Sentences: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he gallassaanne he saatiyaa Aawaa xalaalaappe attin, harai atto saluwan de7iya kiitanchchata gidin, woi tana Na7aa gidinkka ooninne eriyaabi baawa.

English Sentences: Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodee aude gidanaakko, intte erenna gishshau, naagettite; minnite; Xoossaa woossite.

English Sentences: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta yuussai ba keettaa aggidi, oge biya bitaniyaa mala; bitanee ba ashkkaratuyyo huuphen huuphen oosuwaa immidi, eta ba oosuwaayyo alaafe oottiis; qassi kariyaa naagiyaageekka minttidi naagana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, minnite; aissi giikko, keettaawai omarssa gidin, woi qamma bilahe gidin, woi kuttoi waassiyo wode gidin, woi maallado guuraara gidin aude yaanaakko, intte erekketa.

English Sentences: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte akeekennan i yiikko, inttena xiskkidaageeta demmenna mala minnite.

English Sentences: And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo odiyoogaa asa ubbau odais; minnite yaagiis.

English Sentences: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paasikaa Baalaa giyoogaa bonchchiyo gallassainne oittaa meettaa bonchchiyo gallassai gakkanau naa77u gallassai attiis; qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti asi erennan Yesuusa oiqqidi woriyo ogiyaa koyoosona.

English Sentences: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ooshshaa kessenna mala, Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi hegaa oottokko yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper, as he sat at meat, there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious; and she brake the box, and poured it on his head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Biitaaniyaa kataman inchchirichchaa harggiya Simoona son qumaa maanau uttidaashin, issi mishiriyaa albbasxxiroosa giyo shuchchaappe oottido bilqqaadiyaa kumida narddoosiyaa giyo daro al77o shittuwaa ekkada yaasu; yaada he bilqqaadiyaa menttada shittuwaa Yesuusa huuphiyan tigaasu.

English Sentences: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan de7iya asaappe issoi issoi hanqqettidi, Ha shittuwaa coo mooriyoogee aibissee

English Sentences: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha shittuwaa xeetanne ishatamu biraappe dariya waagan baizzidi, miishshaa hiyyeesau immanau danddayettees yaagidi bantta giddon haasayoosona; yaatidi he mishiriyo daro boridosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis; Ha maccaasiyo ainne gooppite; o aissi waisseetii A tau lo77obaa oottaasu.

English Sentences: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesati ubba wode inttenaara de7oosona; intte koyido wode audenne eta maaddanau danddayeeta; shin taani ubba wode inttenaara de7ikke.

English Sentences: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ba danddayidoogaa oottaasu; qassi tana mooguwau giigissanau kasetada shittuwaa tiyaasu.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world, this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; sa7a ubban wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyoosan awaanikka, asai o hassayana mala, ha a oottidoogee odettana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi Yihudaa Asqqoroota giyoogee, Yesuusa qeese halaqatuyyo aattidi immanau etakko biis.

English Sentences: And when they heard it, they were glad, and promised to give him money. And he sought how he might conveniently betray him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode ufaittidi, Nuuni neeyyo miishsha immana yaagidosona; yaagin Yihudai Yesuusa aattidi immanau injjetiya wodiyaa wochchees.

English Sentences: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oittaa miyo gallassaa bonchchiyo koiro gallassi, Paasikaa qumaa maanau anqqara dorssaa shukkiyo wode, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati a, Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi neeni maana qumaa nuuni awa biidi giigissanee yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples, and saith unto them, Go ye into the city, and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water: follow him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77ata hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis; Katamaa biite; intte biishin, otuwan haattaa tookkida issi bitanee inttenaara gaittana; a kaallite.

English Sentences: And wheresoever he shall go in, say ye to the goodman of the house, The Master saith, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?
Wolaitta Sentences: I biidi geliyo keettaawaa, Tamaarissiyaagee nena, Taani ta erissiyo ashkkaratuura Paasikaa qumaa maanau ta imatta kifilee awaanee yaagees yaagite.

English Sentences: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared: there make ready for us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettaawai inttena pooqiyaa bollan de7iya giigi uttida aaho kifiliyaa bessana; hegan nuuyyo giigissite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his disciples went forth, and came into the city, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati kiyidi, katamaa biidosona; Yesuusi banttau odidoogaadankka ubbabaa demmidi, Paasikaa qumaa giigissidosona.

English Sentences: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omariyo wode Yesuusi tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuura yaa biis.

English Sentences: And as they sat and did eat, Jesus said, Verily I say unto you, One of you which eateth with me shall betray me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti uttidi masoofiyaappe qumaa miishin, Yesuusi eta, Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intteppe issoi tanaara miyaagee, tana aattidi immana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they began to be sorrowful, and to say unto him one by one, Is it I? and another said, Is it I?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati dagammidi, huuphiyan huuphiyan a, Tumu taneeshsha giyoogaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto them, It is one of the twelve, that dippeth with me in the dish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, I ha intte tammanne naa77atuppe issuwaa; i tanaara issippe tushkkanau ba oittaa shaatiyan yeddiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The Son of man indeed goeth, as it is written of him: but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! good were it for that man if he had never been born.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, Asa Na7ai, Xoossaa maxaafai haiqqana giidoogaadan haiqqana; shin tana, Asa Na7aa, aattidi immiya urau aayye7ana; he urai yelettennan attiyaakko, au keha shin yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as they did eat, Jesus took bread, and blessed, and brake it, and gave to them, and said, Take, eat: this is my body.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti miishin, Yesuusi oittaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatiis; he oittaa menttidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo immiiddi, Heite; hagee ta ashuwaa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them: and they all drank of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Burccukkuwaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatidi, etayyo immiis; immin ubbaikka he burccukkuwaappe uyidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, Hagee ooratta maachchan daro asaa gishshau gukkiya ta suuttaa.
