English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; taani Xoossaa kawotettan ooratta woine eessaa uyana gallassai gakkanaassi, naa77anttuwaa ha woine eessaa mulekka uyikke yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mazamuriyaa yexxidoogaappe guyyiyan, Dabira Zaite Deriyaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, Intte ubbai tana yeggi bayidi baqatana; aissi giikko, Xoossaa maxaafai, Xoossai dorssaa heemmiyaagaa worana; worin dorssai ubbai laalettana yaagees.

English Sentences: But after that I am risen, I will go before you into Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, intteppe kasetada Galiila baana yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi zaaridi, Eti ubbati nena yeggi bayidi baqatikkokka, taani nena mulekka yeggikke yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus saith unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this day, even in this night, before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; hachchi qammi kuttoi naa77utoo waassanaappe kase, neeni tana heezzutoo kaddana yaagiis.

English Sentences: But he spake the more vehemently, If I should die with thee, I will not deny thee in any wise. Likewise also said they all.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi kaseegaappekka minttidi, Taani harai atto, nenaara issippe haiqqiyaakkokka, nena mulekka kaddikke yaagiis. Qassi harati ubbatikka hegaadan giidosona.

English Sentences: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane: and he saith to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geetesemaane giyo sohuwaa biidosona; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, Taani Xoossaa woossanaashin, intte hagan uttiishshite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John, and began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa banaara ekki efiis; daro gencceeciisinne waayettiis.

English Sentences: And saith unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death: tarry ye here, and watch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta, Taani haiqqana gakkanaassikka kayyottais; hagan takkishshite; xiskkoppite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuttaa sinttaukko shiiqiiddi, biittan gufannidi, danddayettiyaabaa gidikko, he wodee baappe aadhdhana mala, Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka, Abbaa, ta Aawau, ubbabai neeyyo danddayettees; ha burccukkuwaa taappe digga; shin neeni koyiyoobai hanoppe attin, taani koyiyoobai hanoppo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratukko simmi yiidi, xiskkidaageeta demmidi PHeexiroosa, Simoonaa, xiskkadii Neeni issi saatekkonne naaganau danddayabeikkii

English Sentences: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paaciyan intte gelenna mala, naagitenne Xoossaa woossite; ayyaanai giigi uttiis; shin ashoi daafuranchcha yaagiis.

English Sentences: And again he went away, and prayed, and spake the same words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka biidi kaseegaadankka Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: And when he returned, he found them asleep again, (for their eyes were heavy,) neither wist they what to answer him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkaratukko guyye simmidi i yiyo wode, xiskkidaageeta demmiis; eta aifiyaa xiskkoi goozi wottido gishshau, ayyo ai haasayiyaakkokka eribookkona.

English Sentences: And he cometh the third time, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take your rest: it is enough, the hour is come; behold, the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzanttuwaa etakko yiidi, Ha77i gakkanaassikka xiskkeetiinne shemppeetii Gidana; wodee gakkiis; be7ite, tana, Asa Na7aa, nagaranchcha asatun aattidi immiyo wodee gakkiis.

English Sentences: Rise up, let us go; lo, he that betrayeth me is at hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Denddidi hinddite; be7ite, tana aattidi immiyaagee hageeho gakkiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately, while he yet spake, cometh Judas, one of the twelve, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa biron haasayishin, tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, Yihudai, sohuwaara gakki wodhdhiis; qassi qeese halaqati higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati kiittin, bisuwaanne dullaa oiqqida daro asai aara issippe yiis.

English Sentences: And he that betrayed him had given them a token, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he; take him, and lead him away safely.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aattidi immiyaagee he daro asaayyo, Taani yeriyoogee a; a oiqqidi loitti naagidi, ekki efiite yaagidi malaataa yooti wottiis.

English Sentences: And as soon as he was come, he goeth straightway to him, and saith, Master, master; and kissed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai gakkosaarakka Yesuusakko shiiqidi, Tamaarissiyaagoo yaagidi Yesuusa yeri ekkiis.

English Sentences: And they laid their hands on him, and took him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He daro asai Yesuusa mintti oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And one of them that stood by drew a sword, and smote a servant of the high priest, and cut off his ear.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin matan eqqidaageetuppe issoi ba bisuwaa shoddinne qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa shocidi, a haittaa qanxxi oliis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, he shiiqida daro asaa, Tana pangga kessidi, pangga oiqqiyoogaadan oiqqanau bisonne dulla oiqqidi yiidetii

English Sentences: I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and ye took me not: but the scriptures must be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissaidda, gallassi gallassi inttenaara de7iyo wode tana oiqqibeekketa; shin Xoossaa maxaafati giidoogee polettanau bessees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they all forsook him, and fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati ubbati a yeggi bayidi baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And there followed him a certain young man, having a linen cloth cast about his naked body; and the young men laid hold on him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Naxala xalaalan ba kalluwaa kammida issi yelaga bitanee Yesuusa kaalliyaagaa asai oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he bitanee naxalaa oli bayidi, kallo xiire baqatiis.

English Sentences: And they led Jesus away to the high priest: and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusa qeese ubbatu halaqaa soo, qeese halaqa ubbati, cimatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti shiiqidosaa ekki efiis.

English Sentences: And Peter followed him afar off, even into the palace of the high priest: and he sat with the servants, and warmed himself at the fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi qeese ubbatu halaqaa dirssa giddo gakkanaassi haahuwan a kaalliis; yan naagiyaagaara tamaa ho77iiddi, utti bayiis.

English Sentences: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne yaa7aa asai ubbai Yesuusa woranau a bolli markka koyidosona; shin ainne demmibookkona.

English Sentences: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, daro asati a bolli wordduwaa markkattidosona; shin eta markkatettai issi mala gidenna.

English Sentences: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi asati denddi eqqidi Yesuusa bolli,

English Sentences: We heard him say, I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and within three days I will build another made without hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: I, Taani asai keexxido ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada, asai keexxibeenna hara Beeta Maqidasiyaa heezzu gallassa giddon keexxana giishin, nuuni siyida yaagidi wordduwaa markkattidosona.

English Sentences: But neither so did their witness agree together.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin harai atto eta markkatettai hegankka issi mala gidibeenna.

English Sentences: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqai asa ubbaa sinttan denddi eqqidi Yesuusa, Hageeti nena mootiyo mootuwau neeyyo zaariyoobi baawee yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: But he held his peace, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him, and said unto him, Art thou the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi co77u giidi, ainne zaaribeenna; qeese ubbatu halaqai a, Anjjettida Xoossaa Na7ai Kiristtoosi nenee yaagidi naa77anttuwaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, I am: and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, Ee tana; intte tana, Asa Na7aa, wolqqaama Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttidaashiininne saluwaa shaaraara yiishin be7ana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the high priest rent his clothes, and saith, What need we any further witnesses?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqai ba maayuwaa pooshshi olidi, Nuna hagaappe sinttan aissi hara markka koshshii

English Sentences: Ye have heard the blasphemy: what think ye? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte a cashshaa siyideta; intte qofai aibee yaagiis; yaagin eti ubbai, I haiqqana bessees yaagidi a bolli pirddidosona.

English Sentences: And some began to spit on him, and to cover his face, and to buffet him, and to say unto him, Prophesy: and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issooti issooti a bolli cushettaa doommidosona; a aifiyaa goozidi dechchidi, Nena dechchidai oonee Ane hananabaa yoota! yaagidosona; qassi naagiyaageetikka a qinxxalliyaa baqqiiddi ekki efiidosona.

English Sentences: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi dirssa giddon hirkkiira de7ishin, qeese ubbatu halaqaa macca ashkkaratuppe issinniyaa yaasu.

English Sentences: And when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaada PHeexiroosi tamaa ho77iyaagaa be7ada, tishshi ootta xeellada, Neenikka Naazireeta Yesuusaara issippe de7aasa yaagaasu.

English Sentences: But he denied, saying, I know not, neither understand I what thou sayest. And he went out into the porch; and the cock crew.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, Neeni giyoobai aibakko taani erikke; tau akeekettenna yaagidi kaddiis; yaatidi dirssaa penggiyaakko kiyiis; kuttoikka waassiis.

English Sentences: And a maid saw him again, and began to say to them that stood by, This is one of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: He ashkkariyaa PHeexiroosa be7ada, a matan eqqida asata, Ha bitaneekka etaara de7ees gaada gujjada oduwaa doommaasu.

English Sentences: And he denied it again. And a little after, they that stood by said again to Peter, Surely thou art one of them: for thou art a Galilaean, and thy speech agreeth thereto.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi qassikka kaddiis. Guuttaa gam77ishin, matan eqqida asati naa77anttuwaa PHeexiroosa, Neeni tuma etaara issippe de7aasa; aissi giikko, neeni Galiila biitta asa yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he began to curse and to swear, saying, I know not this man of whom ye speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, Taani hegaa intte giyo bitaniyaa erikke! yaagidi bana qanggettaanne caaquwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And the second time the cock crew. And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him, Before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice. And when he thought thereon, he wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaarakka kuttoi naa77anttuwaa waassi aggiis; PHeexiroosi bana Yesuusi, Neeni kuttoi naa77utoo waassanaappe kase heezzutoo tana kaddana giidoogaa hassayidi, daro yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council, and bound Jesus, and carried him away, and delivered him to Pilate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maallado guuran sohuwaara qeese halaqati cimatuuranne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuura yaa7aa asa ubbaara maqettidi, Yesuusa qachchidi efiidi, PHilaaxoosayyo aattidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And Pilate asked him, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answering said unto him, Thou sayest it.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi a, Neeni Aihudatu kawoo yaagidi oichchiis. Yesuusi zaaridi a, Neenikka gaasa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqati Yesuusa daroban mootidosona.

English Sentences: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHilaaxoosi naa77anttuwaa Yesuusa, Neeyyo zaariyoobi baawee Eti ne bolli woqqa mootuwaa ehiyaakko be7ikkii yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: But Jesus yet answered nothing; so that Pilate marvelled.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi harabaa zaarennan ixxin, PHilaaxoosi garamettiis.

English Sentences: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosayyo Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassan asai koyiyo issi uraa qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees.

English Sentences: And there was one named Barabbas, which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him, who had committed murder in the insurrection.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode issi Barbbaana giyo bitanee ooshshaa kessidi shemppo worida asatuura issippe qasho keettan de7ees.

English Sentences: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqida daro asai PHilaaxoosi kaseegaadankka oottana mala, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, woosaa doommiis.

English Sentences: But Pilate answered them, saying, Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi asaa zaaridi, Taani intteyyo Aihudatu kawuwaa birshshiyoogaa koyeetii yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, qeese halaqati Yesuusa qanaatidi aatti immidoogaa PHilaaxoosi eriis.

English Sentences: But the chief priests moved the people, that he should rather release Barabbas unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeese halaqati Yesuusa gishshaa Barbbaana birshshanaadan, he shiiqida asai PHilaaxoosa woossana mala, asaa maqqidosona.

English Sentences: And Pilate answered and said again unto them, What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi naa77anttuwaa, Yaatin, ha Aihuda kawo intte giyoogaa waatoo yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they cried out again, Crucify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asai PHilaaxoosayyo naa77anttuwaa ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada a kaqqa yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Pilate said unto them, Why, what evil hath he done? And they cried out the more exceedingly, Crucify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi asaa, Aissi I ai iitabaa oottidee yaagiis. SHin asai kaseegaappekka ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada a kaqqa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi asaa ufaissanau koyidi, Barbbaana asaayyo birshshiis; yaatidi lissuwan Yesuusa garafidi, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqanau etau aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Praetorium; and they call together the whole band.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, wotaaddarati Yesuusa deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa ekki efiidi, hara wotaaddarata ubbaa issippe xeesidosona.

English Sentences: And they clothed him with purple, and platted a crown of thorns, and put it about his head,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi zo7o afalaa a maizzidosona; agunttaa akiliiliyaa giigissidi, a huuphiyan wottidosona.

English Sentences: And began to salute him, Hail, King of the Jews!
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan a, Aihudatu kawuwau saro de7ai yaagiiddi, ayyo zigettaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And they smote him on the head with a reed, and did spit upon him, and bowing their knees worshipped him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A huuphiyaa shombboqo gatiman shocidosona; qassi a bolli cuchchidosona; gulbbatidi ayyo goinnidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A bolli qilliiccidoogaappe guyyiyan, zo7o afalaa appe qaari ekkidi, a afalaa a maizzidosona; maizzidi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, a kaqqanau ekki efiidosona.

English Sentences: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian, who passed by, coming out of the country, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to bear his cross.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biidi, Iskkinddiranne Rufoosa yelida aawaa, issi Simoona giyo Qareena biitta asi, gaxaappe katamaa yiyaagaara gaittidi, Yesuusa masqqaliyaa wolqqan toossidosona.

English Sentences: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, The place of a skull.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Golggottaa giyoosaa Yesuusa efiidosona. Golggottaa giyoogee Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh: but he received it not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Karbbiyaa giyo xalee wolahettido woine eessaa Yesuusayyo uyanau immidosona; shin i uyennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, a kaqqidosona; qassi oona gakkanaakko eranau a afalaa shaakkidi, saamaa yeggidosona.

English Sentences: And it was the third hour, and they crucified him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi a kaqqiyo wode, maallado heezzu saate.

English Sentences: And the superscription of his accusation was written over, THE KING OF THE JEWS.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, Aihudatu kawuwaa yaagidi a mootiyo xifatiyaa xaafi wottidosona.

English Sentences: And with him they crucify two thieves; the one on his right hand, and the other on his left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusaara naa77u panggata issuwaa appe ushachcha baggaara, qassi issuwaa appe haddirssa baggaara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona.

English Sentences: And the scripture was fulfilled, which saith, And he was numbered with the transgressors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafai, Iitabaa oottida asatuura i paidettiis yaagiyoogee polettiis.

English Sentences: And they that passed by railed on him, wagging their heads, and saying, Ah, thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ogiyaara aadhdhiya asai Yesuusa karidi, ba huuphiyaa qaattiiddi cayiis; A77a! Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada heezzu gallassa giddon keexxiyaagoo, ne huuphiyaa ashsha;

English Sentences: Save thyself, and come down from the cross.
Wolaitta Sentences: ane masqqaliyaa bollappe wodhdha yaagiis.

English Sentences: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes, He saved others; himself he cannot save.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qeese halaqati higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuura issippe Yesuusa bolli qilliiccidi, hagaadan yaagidosona; Harata ashshiis; shin bana ashshanau danddayenna;

English Sentences: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross, that we may see and believe. And they that were crucified with him reviled him.
Wolaitta Sentences: nuuni be7idi ammanana mala, Kiristtoosi Israa7eela kawoi, ane masqqaliyaa bollappe ha77i wodhdho yaagidosona. Qassi harai atto, aara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettidaageetikka a bolli qilliiccidosona.

English Sentences: And when the sixth hour was come, there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppun saateppe doommidi, uddufun saate gakkanaassi, biitta ubbai xumiis.

English Sentences: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Uddufun saatiyan Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Elohee, Elohee, laamaa sabaqitaanii yaagiis. Hegaa giyoogee, Ta Xoossau, ta Xoossau, tana aissi aggadii giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And some of them that stood by, when they heard it, said, Behold, he calleth Elias.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan eqqida asaappe issoi issoi hegaa siyidi, Be7ite; Eelaasa xeesees yaagiis.

English Sentences: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him to drink, saying, Let alone; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down.
Wolaitta Sentences: He asaappe issoi woxxidi, gombbilla mala ispponjjiyan caala woine eessaa kunttiis; hegaa shombboqo gatimaa xeeran wottidi, Nanggite; Eelaasi masqqaliyaappe a wottanau yaanaakkonne ane be7oos yaagiiddi Yesuusa doonaakko ushshanau shiishshiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus cried with a loud voice, and gave up the ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiishshin Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu ootti waassidi, haiqqi bayiis.

English Sentences: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyan kaqettida magalashoi qommoppe duge gakkanaassi, naa77u kiyidi pooshetti wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And when the centurion, which stood over against him, saw that he so cried out, and gave up the ghost, he said, Truly this man was the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Masqqaliyaappe sintta baggaara hegan eqqida issi mato halaqai, hegaa keenaa Yesuusi waassidi haiqqidoogaa be7ido wode, Ha bitanee tumu Xoossaa Na7aa yaagiis.

English Sentences: There were also women looking on afar off: among whom was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses, and Salome;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan haahuwan eqqidi xeelliya amarida maccaasati de7oosona; eta giddon Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama, kaaluwaa Yaaqoobanne Yoosa aayyiyaa Mairaamanne Salooma de7oosona.

English Sentences: (Who also, when he was in Galilee, followed him, and ministered unto him;) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: He macca asati Yesuusi Galiilan de7iyo wode, a kaallidaageetanne a maaddidaageeta; qassi Yesuusaara issippe Yerusalaame biida hara daro macca asati hegan de7oosona.

English Sentences: And now when the even was come, because it was the preparation, that is, the day before the sabbath,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omarido wode, yaa7aa asan bonchchettida issi Yooseefa giyo bitanee, Xoossaa kawotettai yaanaagaa naagi uttidaagee,

English Sentences: Joseph of Arimathaea, an honourable counsellor, which also waited for the kingdom of God, came, and went in boldly unto Pilate, and craved the body of Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Armmaatiyaasa giyo katamaa asi yiis; he gallassai wonttetta Sambbataayyo giigettiyo gallassa gidido gishshau, Yooseefi xalidi PHilaaxoosakko biidi, Yesuusa ahaa ekkanau woossiis.

English Sentences: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead: and calling unto him the centurion, he asked him whether he had been any while dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusi haiqqidoogaa siyido wode garamettiis; mato halaqaa xeesidi, I haiqqoosappe gam77idee yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And when he knew it of the centurion, he gave the body to Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusi haiqqidoogaa mato halaqaappe siyidi, a ahaa Yooseefayyo imissiis.

English Sentences: And he bought fine linen, and took him down, and wrapped him in the linen, and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock, and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi moogo afalaa shammiis; Yesuusa ahaa masqqaliyaappe wottidi, afalan xaaxidi, shuchchaa woocido asa moogiyo gonggoluwaa giddon a ahaa wottiis; qassi he gonggoluwaa doonan gita shuchchaa gonddorssidi wottiis.

English Sentences: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamanne Yoosa aayyiyaa Mairaama Yesuusa ahaa eti awan wottiyaakko be7oosona.

English Sentences: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sambbatai aadhdhidoogaappe guyyiyan, Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaama, Yaaqooba aayyiyaa Mairaamanne Salooma biidi, Yesuusa ahaa tiyanau shittuwaa shammidosona.

English Sentences: And very early in the morning the first day of the week, they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woggaa gallassi maallado daro guuran xalqqee kiyishin, he gonggoluwaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And they said among themselves, Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta giddon issoi issuwaara, Gonggoluwaa doonaappe nuuyyo shuchchaa oonee gonddorssidi digganaishsha yaagidi haasayoosona.

English Sentences: And when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away: for it was very great.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xeelliyo wode, he daro gita shuchchaa gonddorssirggidoogaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: And entering into the sepulchre, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, clothed in a long white garment; and they were affrighted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa giddo geliyo wode, issi wodalla bitanee bootta maayuwaa maayidi, ushachcha baggaara uttidaagaa be7idi dagammidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Be not affrighted: Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth, which was crucified: he is risen; he is not here: behold the place where they laid him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i eta, Dagammoppite. Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqido Naazireeta Yesuusa intte koyeeta. I hagan baawa; denddiichchiis. Eti a wottidosaa hagaa be7ite.

English Sentences: But go your way, tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee: there shall ye see him, as he said unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin biidi Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuyyoonne PHeexiroosayyo, Yesuusi intteppe kasetidi Galiila bees; i intteyyo odidoogaadankka intte a yaani be7ana yaagidi hagaa yootite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they went out quickly, and fled from the sepulchre; for they trembled and were amazed: neither said they any thing to any man; for they were afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Macca asati banttana yashshai kokkorssido gishshau, Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaappe kiyidi baqatidosona; qassi eti yayyido gishshau, asau hegaa ooyyoonne ainne yootibookkona. Maccaasati biidi, banttau odidobaa ubbaa PHeexiroosaunne aara de7iyaageetau qanttan yootidosona; hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba huuphen erissiyo ashkkaratu bolli, merinau ashshiya laamettenna geeshsha wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa, awai mokkiyoosaappe wulliyoosaa gakkanaassi kiittiis.

English Sentences: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, out of whom he had cast seven devils.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, Woggaa gallassi maallado, laappun xalaheta kessido Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamiyyo kasetidi beettiis.

English Sentences: And she went and told them that had been with him, as they mourned and wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: A baada kase aara de7iyaageetuyyo, qarettiiddinne yeekkiiddi uttidaageetuyyo odaasu;

English Sentences: And they, when they had heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, believed not.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Yesuusi paxa de7iyoogaanne iyyo beettidoogaa eti siyido wode, i oduwaa tuma gibookkona.

English Sentences: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them, as they walked, and went into the country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, etappe naa77ati katamaappe gaxaa kiyidi biishin, ogiyan Yesuusi kaseegaappe dummatidi, etayyo beettiis.

English Sentences: And they went and told it unto the residue: neither believed they them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti guyye simmidi, haratuyyo odidosona; shin haratikka eta oduwaa tuma gibookkona.

English Sentences: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guyyeppe tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkarati qumaa miishin, Yesuusi etayyo beettiis. Etayyo ammanoi bainna gishshau, i eta boriis; qassi haiquwaappe i denddidoogaa hinkkooti etau yootin, eti ammanennan ixxido gishshaunne yootin siyennaageeta gidiyo gishshau, i eta boriis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta hagaadan yaagiis; Sa7a ubbaa biidi, asa ubbau wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootite.

English Sentences: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniyaageenne xammaqettidaagee attana; shin ammanennaagaa bolli Xoossai pirddana.

English Sentences: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniyaageetuyyo ha malaatati imettana eti ta sunttan xalaheta kessana; qassi eti dumma dumma qaalan haasayana.

English Sentences: They shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti shooshsha oiqqikkokka, woi marzze uyikkokka eta qohenna. Qassi eti bantta kushiyaa hargganchchatu bolli wottana; wottin he hargganchchati paxana yaagiis.

English Sentences: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuura haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai a pude saluwaa ekki efin, Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttiis.

English Sentences: And they went forth, and preached every where, the Lord working with them, and confirming the word with signs following. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati biidi, ubbasan qaalaa yootidosona. Godaikka etaara issippe oottees; eti yootiyo qaalaikka tuma gididoogaa Xoossai etayyo immiyo malaatatun erissiis.
